comments: Amazing game. Me and my friend spend hours on it. I get to shows him my mods. He has none though we both have completed the levels. The game NEVER AND I REPEAT NEVER gets boring. Definitely better than the angry birds series must download. The only problome is the metal flap things don't work correctly. They just float in midair.Apart from that  Please make a new selection of levels. My life depends on it!!!!

The game and level desgins promote and foster a great degree of creastive thinking. With very unique mechanics and obstacles that actually require thought and consideration when building. It has great art, along with many bonus levels and content. Fun game overall but level experiences do wildly vary sometimes. From simple to extremely  difficult, sometimes you win by mer luck and not strategy. Along with all that I don't know if anyone else experienced this but the levers on lvl6 were buggy and never worked. All in all good game to play.

Great game but el porkado is broken I can barley ever get any crates, they are in levels that are literally impossible to complete, fix now also the king pig system is garbage. I accidentally piled up about 100 of each cake and then spent about an hour dragging my finger hundreds of times. Power ups are too rare. There should just be a feed all button or something, can I please improve the king pig system

FIX THE ROAD TO EL PORKADO I swear this is frustrating to the point of unplayable. No, those levels ARE unplayable. They cannot be done with this platform glitch at all. Also, sometimes in sandbox mode when I click the tick it disappears when it hits the ground. Occasional and not as game breaking or frustrating as the moving platforms not working but still

Generally great, but destroyed by graphics/world modeling glitches that render levels impossible to complete! Generally involving trap doors that aren't in the right place. Frustrating. AND the new cake race won't unlock rewards- 24000 hrs to go apparently so I can't play more levels.

I don't  understand why people complain about ads and call Rovio money hungry. If may be a "free" game but really nothing is completely free. Developers deserve to get paid. It costs to have a game. Free games have ads just like TV. And you don't have to make the in-app purchase. GO buy a game.
description: From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGRCreate the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!Features:● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!● Free updates!● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!Mechanic Pig● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!● All you have to do is pilot it!● Tweak his design to get all three stars!New Episode: The Road to El PorkadoEmbark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!Get ready to see pigs fly!Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:http://facebook.com/badpiggiesFollow us on Twitter:http://twitter.com/badpiggiesTerms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacyImportant Message for ParentsThis game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!

IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!

"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku

“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN

“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play

"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGR

Create the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!

The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!

With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!

Features:
● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!
● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!
● Free updates!
● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!
● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...
● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!

Mechanic Pig
● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!
● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!
● All you have to do is pilot it!
● Tweak his design to get all three stars!

New Episode: The Road to El Porkado
Embark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!

Get ready to see pigs fly!

Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:
http://facebook.com/badpiggies

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/badpiggies

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy


Important Message for Parents

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.

comments: Everything was great except in the beginning it kept saying I didn't find any mice but I found them twice on the first one.. but then I restarted it and it worked fine.. until it kept freezing and I had to restart my tablet.. after doing that like 5 times it worked great thru out the whole game.. I kinda felt like it was a lot shorter then the other games. But other then that I had fun playing it and I'm super excited for other to come out so hurryyy!!!!!!! Lol

This is just like the other game you guys made, the one with the doctor in the hospital, down to the exact same thing of "play the first couple of levels for free but if you like you pay" I bet this one is for the same price. On a side note, the story is different but the game play is the same, go have a look if you want. I will say this is a good game and I take nothing away from the hard work you have done. Good looking graphics, good smooth game play. A game you can get into and do try the other games of this developers you may like it as well. Over all a good game I just do not think it is worth $15. But best of luck guys.

Great game  I don't normally spend the Ching on many games. . This has a different take of an old favorite.  But none of the challenge levels are working on my game.  Once it's over, nothing happens.  I don't get credit for work achieved and I have to restart with same result. A glitch. Waiting for update

I absolutely love this game. However I had to order a new phone due to mine being replaced for insurance purposes and I was logged into my Facebook and lost all my progress and the app is NOW wanting me to repay. I don't wanna have to pay another 9.99. If there's anyway I can get my game back.

Sometimes the game did responding to my tap. And what makes me very angry is i had to redo challenge several times because of the game stop (no "level complete" appear), lily parker just stand still, nothing happens...all i can do is tap setting button and choose : back to map or rerty the level.. i counter this issue on challenge mission only, not yet in normal mission.. And it's very annoying

Love these games. I've purchased them all from different sagas. I'm just encountering a  problem with this one in particular. At the end of every challenge it glitches and I can't get my rewards. It stays on the challenge and I have to go back to the menu and play again. Pretty frustrating. Hoping it can be resolved.
description: Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levelsTry the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa
descriptionHTML:
Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!

In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!

Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.

When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?

Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.

🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!
🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations
🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation
🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques
🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels
🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds
🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file
🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levels

Try the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.

Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa
recentChanges: We’ve made a few minor text adjustments to make it easier to solve the case
summary: Are you ready to solve the case and bring a criminal to justice? ⚖️ 🕵️‍♀️
title: Parker & Lane: Criminal Justice

comments: Saw in Facebook and thought I would give it a try. I am now addicted. I love how realistic they make the interaction seem. The only things that would make it better is if it would let us type our own responses and the system understood them and was able to respond and if there was actually more "proving innocence" and less tetrisy type games.. But that doesn't not effect my interest at all. Most addictive and fun game I have found. Will def recommend

UPDATE : Changed from 5 stars to 3 because of the puzzles. As you get further into the game, it is obvious that you are supposed to spend money because you are literally not given enough of the right color blocks to complete the puzzles without purchased hacks. That really sucks. Too bad.    This is an interesting game with some unique interfaces and an engrossing plot. You interact with the other characters (in-game AI) via chat, and telephone (in-game AI) to learn the plot and your place in it. In order to access the info you need to move forward, you have to solve puzzles. Very cool, love it.

It is great, nice and interesting story that makes me keep playing. What really bothers me is the fact that the puzzle takes FOREVER to solve. I know that the farther you are in a game the harder it gets, but it's just not logic to collect 25 pieces of each color at a puzzle and they only throw you 15-20 pieces and in such little amount of moves. The only way to solve it is spending money buying hacks or having too much patience. I would have deleted it long time ago if it wasn't for the story.

This game is great. It's my favorite game of all thus far. I love this game. It's so addicting and the story line is perfect. I love how you can text and also receive/make calls. Great game for people who like puzzles and mystery. Passes the time quickly. Only thing I am having problems with is trying to link it to my facebook. The first time I had this game I had gotten pretty far and logged in with ease, long story short, got a new phone, installed my game, try to connect to my facebook for my saved game and.... my phone glitches and shuts me out. So I had to start over. Other than that this game is great I would recommend to anyone.

I like the idea but the responses are off quite often. For example: "Please don't hang up!" -I'm here "I don't know! Not a clue. Doesn't make sense and breaks the immersion.   It's another game similar to SIM - Sara is Missing, which I'd recommend for now. It's more polished and engaging. The characters are more distinct than in I Am Innocent.  This just seems to be designed to make you spend cash eventually, not because someone actually enjoyed developing it.

It's honestly pretty good. It's rare that an app game keeps my attention for more than a week, but this one has kept me going for a while now. The story is interesting enough for me to keep going with the puzzles, however, I would like a little more writing and editing to be done with the dialogue. It can be kinda regular and break immersion. But it's still entertaining.
description: I Am Innocent is an original detective game with puzzle elements. Use realistic in-game phone calls, a messenger, computer hacking, photographs, and documents to investigate a series of murders with teenage victims. The killings are somehow connected to the disappearance of your sister many years ago.The game’s many characters, with their complex personalities and skeletons in the closet, plus its ethical dilemmas and emotional scenes create a realistic atmosphere and weave an involved, mysterious story that’ll keep you engrossed to the very end.Main features:- Investigate a complicated serial killer case.- Realistic phone calls, photos, documents, and computer hacking.- Communicate easily without needing to deal with huge paragraphs of text.- Your answers affect your relationships with the characters.- Multiple ending options, depending on your choices and your relationships.- Many days of gameplay.This game is completely free but might include some optional in-app purchases that make it easier to finish.
descriptionHTML:
I Am Innocent is an original detective game with puzzle elements. Use realistic in-game phone calls, a messenger, computer hacking, photographs, and documents to investigate a series of murders with teenage victims. The killings are somehow connected to the disappearance of your sister many years ago.

The game’s many characters, with their complex personalities and skeletons in the closet, plus its ethical dilemmas and emotional scenes create a realistic atmosphere and weave an involved, mysterious story that’ll keep you engrossed to the very end.

Main features:

- Investigate a complicated serial killer case.
- Realistic phone calls, photos, documents, and computer hacking.
- Communicate easily without needing to deal with huge paragraphs of text.
- Your answers affect your relationships with the characters.
- Multiple ending options, depending on your choices and your relationships.
- Many days of gameplay.

This game is completely free but might include some optional in-app purchases that make it easier to finish.
developerAddress: Punane tn 56, Lasnamäe district, Tallinn city, Harju county, 13619
summary: An original detective game about serial killings with puzzle elements.
title: I Am Innocent

comments: As others have said, the longer you play, the worse it performs and the more space it takes up, and after a while ads start causing the game to crash. However I've managed to get around it by reinstalling every couple of weeks. Other than that it's a good little game.

It's a pretty fun game, better than I thought it would be. There is one problem, you don't really need to buy "Flooz", but if you do. The prices are a little outrageous. Like 5$ for 100 Flooz, seems a little money hungry. And 100 Flooz for 15 days is 29$ is outrageous as well. I've played other games with better things to do besides upgrading and usually 100 "diamonds" of anything would last 30 and would cost 10-15$. Seems like you're trying to rip people off. Besides the money hungry creators, good game to kill time.

The first idle game that caught my attention. At first, i thought that it's just "one of those idle games".. But, the more I play the more i get hooked because of unique game mechanics. I might give this 5 stars in the future.

I think the game would be enjoyable if it did not crash ALL the time. Get to a new level? Crash. Watch a video? Crash. Crash Them All might be a more fitting name for the only game that has ever crashed more than once on this phone.

It has bugs. Like how sometimes skills don't activate right away, and on rare occasions, not at all. The currencies are pretty fair; I don't feel like have to buy anything (sucks for the devs, but it's not like I can buy anything even if I wanted to). Events keep the game fresh, and I always feel like I have something to do at all times, so it does a good job of keeping me occupied for 20-30 minutes at a time.

Incredible game play it for hours and love it soooo much only good things to say other than server connecting but it's no big deal love the game the style the graphics the game play is all awsome I do have some ideas for the game if your interested number one being adding carnivore and herbivore types into the game so you could have dinosaurs and number 2 is world bosses were the entire community can all defeat one boss and 3 to have the ability to friend people not through Facebook. Love the game it's so good thanks for putting so much hard work into it and adding awsome features cheers

While they compete and cry.

The game is cool except the purchase popups. They don't even bother to wait until your attack setup window closes, just slam you with popups while your in the middle of doing something. Smart thing would be to wait until the active window closes before flooding folks with popups..not smart. How many people decide to spend money after getting pissed off? You show no respect to the player by interrupting their train of thought and action plan by doing this. Address this huge issue and the rating will go up.

comments: I first got this game because it seemed interesting and whatnot, but I then completed the tutorial and went on to race other people but when I pressed the race button, I lost 20 energy but I didn't go on to race anyone or do anything else really. I then pressed to race button again and again and nothing happened other than me losing all of my energy. I don't know why this happened but I'd like compensation, thank you.

Was a great game but is all messed up now.  Freezing, dropping, can barely even get races to start.  Don't know what happened but it needs to be fixed back to the way it used to be. If fixed would be all 5 stars.

I'm fed up of this game taking away my energy but not even putting me in a race! And I don't even get reimbursed for it! It connects and puts me in a race sometimes but nobody is there.... or sometimes it just glitches before putting me in to the race.......... sort it out. I'm deleting this bull.
Few glitches where it takes fuel, then never starts a race search.   But it isn't bad if I've played every day since I downloaded it.  34 consecutive days so far!

Fun when it works, but crashes after every race when I try to select a reward.  Also, I don't know where you guys bought all your 5-star reviews, but you might want to get your money back. They all sound basically the same and there are at least 200 that say "best racing game" or "best racing game ever" word for word. Do better. You made a great game, just fix the bugs and stop faking it.

Hard to rate higher than one when it's so bugged that you can't actually race. Fix the bugs so it becomes playable again. New update just made it worse. Real shame as this is a cool game when it works.

In this free app, you can transform into one of four Ben 10 Aliens, Diamondhead, Heatblast, Stinkfly or Four Arms, each with their own unique facial interactions and character specific animations. Then take on Zombozo and his robots in 360-degree augmented reality action!

With Ben 10 Alien Experience you get two apps in one, a super cool face swapper and an action-packed robot blaster. Use your device’s camera and see the transformation take place in front of your very eyes as you become one of Ben Tennyson’s amazing alien forms.

Warm things up as Heatblast and experience his fiery powers or chill out as Diamondhead and see icicles appear all around you! Become Stinkfly and shoot out slime balls or smash things up as Four Arms. Take photos and record short videos straight to your device before sharing them with family and friends!

description: Jumping rooftops and chasing after nasty criminals to save the city is what a super hero would do on every day of the week. The adventures of climbing the high buildings, falling like death over the crime evil thugs. Protect city fight crime kill mobster and live like a true superhero. Enemies capture hostage and harass people with their tyranny and criminal advancements. Win greatest battle against them. All the hand to hand combat champions and assassins have mobbed up against the system. Police and cops failed. Too risky to involve military to the city and civilian affairs so the crime fighter spider hero is the ultimate choice to overcome the danger. Opportunity to overcome the crime lords who use the military grade weapons and kill hundreds of people every day. Total warzone neglected by the good cops. Ruined environments with best graphics is extraordinary quality that makes this game a great addition to the action genre gaming. Now the ultimatum by the terrorists to destroy the city halls and kill the people in the streets. To avoid becoming the city a slaughterhouse run by criminals, break their gangs today. Hero adventure is endless pursuit of excitement and adventure.Future battle of mobs and people depends on the spider hero. Crime Fighter Spider Hero is one of the best hero games which features the action like movies. Crime Fighter Spider Hero is in a strange war against the mafia families who occupies lands and properties of the innocent civilians. The cartel and gangs are into some serious evil businesses like narcotics and heroin. Drug trafficking destroying the neighborhood. truly working against the war hero. Chase the crime like a shadow and catch it from the neck. Crime Fighter Spider Hero Special features:•	Control territory and make the villains vanish in no time. •	Beat the crap out of thugs and mobsters to teach them a lesson.•	Positive storyline of the game. •	Enthralling and smooth gameplay to deliver the crime story of the city.•	Punish criminal agents and help the citizens survive the battle.•	Use the super power for a positive purpose and bring justice•	Beat the invincible crime cults and anarchy promoters.•	Outlaws in disguise of the common people in the streets are your major target.•	Fearless attacks on the enemies•	Crime lords are striking with a really big arsenalDownload the Crime Fighter Spider Hero free and enjoy applying martial arts against the worst criminals. description: Your friends – fluffy kitten Kiki and adorable puppy Fifi – are inviting you to their new adventures at Royal Pet Hotel. Have fun while exploring the hotel and taking care of your virtual animal guests!There is no time to be bored! Decorate Pet Hotel and design the most amazing reception desk. Help puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room. Unpack Fifi’s clothes, shoes and accessories, and style her bag. Don’t forget to feed Fifi when she is hungry! You can find her favorite dishes at the Hotel Café: pizza, doughnuts and juice cocktails!Play pet style makeover in Kiki’s room, and create the perfect hair and makeup look. comments: Graphics are crystal clear, game play is easy to understand, assists in majority of the steps needed to build and upgrade your city buildings and troops and a dragon. Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

The game is supposed to be for battling your enemy but you spend countless hours sorting through the packs which are random at best in content offering very little for the price paid. They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

Was addictive so I spent 25 over 5 weeks. Not knowing there are no rules on who hits who. High level player just continue to beat down on low level player. Nothing to even it out except spend money. Shame on you game designers

comments: I absolutely love this game! As a person who enjoys strategy games, from RTS such as Stronghold, Supreme Commander, and C&C, this game takes my top 3 for the phone. The match making system is very good at keeping same skilled players together, as well as it isn't very much a pay to win game. The units are decently balanced and the game isn't to slow or fast. Definitely a game I will keep playing for a long time. I do want to ask, if you guys will be putting in a "survival mode", and withstand against waves of enemies. Great job FourThirtyThree

Its a good game, i like this kind of games and i love when i play with friends too! The game its really easy to play, a strategy game and simply as destroy the enemy base... Love it! Its true that not all are going to like this but for me this game its 5 stars. Btw i have started the game and i said i love to play with friends, does this game has a Couple/Duo match to play with them (Not versus them). Thanks in advice, keep staying great!!

The game is okay it has a lot of faults. The matching system is horrible it always puts me against people that are hundreds of levels higher than me. And somehow their money regenerate quicker and they're able to send  out more and bigger and better units out on the battlefield. Even when the matchmaking system puts me against somebody my own level their money regenerates quicker than mine and they send out a lot more units faster than I can for whatever reason. Uninstalling this game

I'll update whenever I can actually play the game. It's up to date. I get to the screen that asks if I'd like to use my Google account or Facebook account. I do not have a Facebook. Obviously I have a Google account. I'm writing this review. I click Google and both options disappear. It sets at that screen where the two options were previously available and nothing happens. I made sure to wait around 5 mins to see if it was a loading issue.. dunno. I'd love to try out the game.

really good game i love it but just some ideas that might make it even better (I think the menu on the left side could have a higher contrast (text and background)or I think the trophy chest amount could be adjusted to the player amount in the clan +to participate in trophy chest you have to be in the clan since it started (midnight)please do some balance changes soon... some untis don't feel to be used enough or some just are OP like the steel saw mech or another idea :to have some way to delete (locked) chests )please reply if you (4:33)see it and want to give a statement

This game is awesome, it reminds me of Guns Up! . The ONLY thing I don't like about it is it's basically pay to win. I only have 5 slots to open chests and it cost gems to open the chest and money to get gems. Other than that, the gameplay is solid. It's very unique in it's actually a wonderfully crafted game and not some thrown together garbage. I probably will end up throwing money at it only because it's made so we'll. But like I said I do feel the process for opening chests is a bit too cash hungry...

comments: Great game! Simplistic in the greatest form from graphics to game play. Would be 5 stars but -1 for placement of bottom ad I mean so easy to accidentally hit. Well placed I'm sure....With recent update I think you get random ad runs too. Game 5+ stars. 4 because of ads..

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars

Smooth control. Awesome idea . Not Much more I can say about it.(First Review). Now, my first thoughts about this game was that it was very good but as I have updated the game it has just been very slow and overturns when you tap. It also randomly takes you to the play store without tapping on an ad.
Ads pop up during gameplay where your fingers contact so it stops game play ... other than that it's good but I've had enough. Fk you chilly:-p uninstalling

The game was awesome and I loved it. But the latest update ruined it with ADS. They put the banner exactly where you mostly tap with the fingers to change direction, the game got laggy which it was not before and has started getting way too many pop ups. Uninstalling. *Sigh*

A lot of frame rate issues. Lost many runs because controls become unresponsive while gameplay continued. Ads are incredible intrusive. That said, it can be really fun if they cleaned up the coding on this simple game.

I tried undownloading and downloading again and it worked when I first opened the app but when I close out it won't load the 2nd time  I opened the app.

Unfortunately, when I got back onto Dash Tag I still had my unlocked pet, Smoky, as my character but it gave me the tutorial pop up. When I closed the game's tab and reopened the game, it had Sparky and I had lost all my coins, gems, and pets. Please help, it would be appreciated! Thanks!

It works for all ads except deal dash. It also has some obstacles in the Coral canyons setting that are difficult to pass. Ideally, most people playing the game are young at age and I personally feel like the game is a little bit too hard. Overall, it's a good game, but I think some adjustments are necessary.
description: PETS ON THE LOOSE!Run, dash, slide, and jump your way through forest treetops, redrock canyons, and other challenging terrain! Collect dozens of pets, complete daily missions, and unlock tons of fun goodies. Welcome to Dash Tag, the best endless runner game! The farther you run, the more you collect. And the more you collect, the more fun you'll have!So whether you prefer to scamper, scurry, or scuttle, join the fun of this amazing pet adventure today!
descriptionHTML:
PETS ON THE LOOSE!

Run, dash, slide, and jump your way through forest treetops, redrock canyons, and other challenging terrain! Collect dozens of pets, complete daily missions, and unlock tons of fun goodies. Welcome to Dash Tag, the best endless runner game! Choose your favorite pet and get ready to run with your friends and evade capture by Misha!

• Collect dozens of rare and unique pets
• Play as every pet you collect
• Unlock power-ups, outfits, and stats
• Speed through levels in pet cars
• Endless runner with new missions every day
• Free to play
• Easy to learn

Use the coins and emeralds you collect to purchase loads of upgrades like costumes, power-ups, and even pet cars! The farther you run, the more you collect. And the more you collect, the more fun you'll have!

So whether you prefer to scamper, scurry, or scuttle, join the fun of this amazing pet adventure today!
recentChanges: Fixed a bug preventing some devices and emulators from launching the game.
summary: Become your favorite pet and see how far you can go in this adventurous runner.
title: Dash Tag - Fun Endless Runner!

description: Airport Show is an exclusive stunt driving event and you’ve been invited to take part! Welcome to the high stakes, high-octane driving competition for the fiercest drivers! The biggest monster trucks need only apply!FEATURES:▶ UNIQUE STUNT ARENA: Drive around an old airport!▶ AWESOME MONSTER TRUCKS: Each vehicle handles differently▶ 70 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE: Drive, do tricks, beat records▶ FREE ROAMING MODE: Explore the area at your own paceTaking place in an airport that’s been repurposed as an obstacle course for giant monster trucks, Monster Truck Airport Show will test your driving skills unlike anything you’ve seen before! Pick one of the amazing, unbelievably huge trucks available and show that you’ve got what it takes to drive them! This is the ultimate, extreme test for the most proficient drivers! Do you have what it takes to take part and pass it with flying colours?Before you prove your worth as a driver, you will need to familiarize yourself with a varied selection of giant, big-wheel monster trucks. There are sports cars turned into monster trucks, a monster truck pickup, even a monster truck bus!Discover all of them and you may find some surprises too! You will take all of those monster trucks onto the arena and use them to beat speed records, perform amazing stunt tricks, even drive across smaller cars parked around! Who’s going to stop you?Depending on the vehicle of your choosing, you will get multiple missions of varying difficulty to complete. You will have to dodge obstacles, use ramps for long distance jumps, drive over cars & tree logs and more! Don’t take your eyes off the road Perform mind-blowing tricks, test your reflexes, become a master stunt driver!There isn’t much that can compare to the power of a speeding monster truck, but that doesn’t mean you can be reckless! Drive safely and carefully and you will surely make it to the end in one piece. If you go a little too wild and crash though, don’t worry. If you make a mistake along the way you can always use a rewind system to correct it without restarting the level from scratch.
descriptionHTML:
Airport Show is an exclusive stunt driving event and you’ve been invited to take part! Welcome to the high stakes, high-octane driving competition for the fiercest drivers! The biggest monster trucks need only apply!

FEATURES:
▶ UNIQUE STUNT ARENA: Drive around an old airport!
▶ AWESOME MONSTER TRUCKS: Each vehicle handles differently
▶ 70 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE: Drive, do tricks, beat records
▶ FREE ROAMING MODE: Explore the area at your own pace

Taking place in an airport that’s been repurposed as an obstacle course for giant monster trucks, Monster Truck Airport Show will test your driving skills unlike anything you’ve seen before! Pick one of the amazing, unbelievably huge trucks available and show that you’ve got what it takes to drive them! This is the ultimate, extreme test for the most proficient drivers! Do you have what it takes to take part and pass it with flying colours?

Before you prove your worth as a driver, you will need to familiarize yourself with a varied selection of giant, big-wheel monster trucks. There are sports cars turned into monster trucks, a monster truck pickup, even a monster truck bus!

Discover all of them and you may find some surprises too! You will take all of those monster trucks onto the arena and use them to beat speed records, perform amazing stunt tricks, even drive across smaller cars parked around! Who’s going to stop you?

Depending on the vehicle of your choosing, you will get multiple missions of varying difficulty to complete. You will have to dodge obstacles, use ramps for long distance jumps, drive over cars & tree logs and more! Don’t take your eyes off the road Perform mind-blowing tricks, test your reflexes, become a master stunt driver!

There isn’t much that can compare to the power of a speeding monster truck, but that doesn’t mean you can be reckless! Drive safely and carefully and you will surely make it to the end in one piece. If you go a little too wild and crash though, don’t worry. If you make a mistake along the way you can always use a rewind system to correct it without restarting the level from scratch.

summary: Amazing monster trucks, mindblowing tricks for the best!
title: Monster Truck XT Airport Derby

It's something to consider when choosing an option.◆Untold Darkness◆Alex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.How does this incident affect your life?And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.- Work hand and win the journalist competition!◆Yearbook◆Your friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.Will you succeed in saving Daisy?Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!◆Hit the Floor!◆Worst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.- Work hard to sign the record deal!- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?◆Features◆- Add stories weekly.- Offer HQ graphic.- Divide up into genres.- Customize the look of a protagonist.- Change storylines depending on options.- Choose appearances depending on occasions.- Bookmark your favorite episode!Official Website: http://myshelfapp.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_SolmareInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/◆About Us◆NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. descriptionHTML:
Your story begins here!
Wanna enjoy living on campus with amazing friends?
Wanna find love with the mysteriously luring vampire?
The choice is yours!

The wiser your choice is, the more interesting your story gets.
You can never put your phone down as these weekly-added stories make you insatiable!

◆Campus Hacker◆
Alice the partygoer and Faith the unexpected are your roommates.
When Norman the football player decides to move in to your flat, things get a little crazy...

- Norman the football player, Peter the gamer, and Dean the aspiring actor are the candidates. Who can make you fall in love?
- Problems at home can be solved if your choice is correct.
- Your choice of an answer also affect your friendship and their lives. It's something to consider when choosing an option.

◆Untold Darkness◆
Alex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.
On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.
How does this incident affect your life?
And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?

- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!
- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.
- Work hand and win the journalist competition!

◆Yearbook◆
Your friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.
Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.
Will you succeed in saving Daisy?
Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...

- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.
- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.
- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!

◆Hit the Floor!◆
Worst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!
While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.
Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.

- Work hard to sign the record deal!
- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?

◆Features◆
- Add stories weekly.
- Offer HQ graphic.
- Divide up into genres.
- Customize the look of a protagonist.
- Change storylines depending on options.
- Choose appearances depending on occasions.
- Bookmark your favorite episode!

Official Website: http://myshelfapp.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_Solmare
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/

◆About Us◆
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best simulation apps for adults. Our sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, or cute guys, then we think that you will love our games!
So download one of our free games today, and find out why our games are so popular!
developerAddress: No.2 Sumitomo Bldg. 4-7-28 Kitahama Chuo-Ku, Osaka 541-0041, Japan
summary: Story changes depending on your choices.
title: My Shelf: My Choice, My Episode

description: Help your people! Join the fight against the Skeleton Boss, and become the best hero in the dungeons.Live a real adventure with this online Action MMORPG game. Enjoy Dungeon Legends for free, and discover an endless world of battles, quests, and epic creatures.Dungeon Legends is a hack & slash game optimized for mobile devices. A classic ARPG experience adapted to touch screens.Fight against other players in the pvp multiplayer modes like the Arena, and become a legend of the dungeons. Go over the dungeons looking for incredible adventures, and legendary treasures, or ask for help to overcome the quests of the online cooperative multiplayer mode. Join a clan and fight the most epic battles to conquer the dungeons.Adapt your hero to your gameplay. Turn your Dwarf into an epic warrior, a healer, a hunter or a protector. Train your hero in the adventure quests, and fight other heroes in the online pvp multiplayer arena.🐲 BUILD YOUR OWN ADVENTUREIt was a long time ago, but Dwarfs remember the Skeleton Boss. He attacked the villages with his army of goblins, skeletons, trolls, and balrogs. But Dwarfs do not surrender, they fear nothing, and they cooperated to hunt their enemies, and battle that army.Dwarfs defeated the Skeleton Boss, and force him to hide in the ancient Dungeons.Now, the Skeleton Boss is back.He is summoning an army to leave his prison, and take revenge on the Dwarfs.The Skeleton Boss is waiting in his throne, deep in the Dungeons.The only hope for the Dwarfs is to find him, cooperate, and hunt him before he recovers his power.🔮DISCOVER AN ENDLESS ADVENTURE RPG GAMEEach quest in this Action RPG is unique. descriptionHTML:
Help your people! Join the fight against the Skeleton Boss, and become the best hero in the dungeons.

Live a real adventure with this online Action MMORPG game. Enjoy Dungeon Legends for free, and discover an endless world of battles, quests, and epic creatures.

Dungeon Legends is a hack & slash game optimized for mobile devices. A classic ARPG experience adapted to touch screens.

Fight against other players in the pvp multiplayer modes like the Arena, and become a legend of the dungeons. Go over the dungeons looking for incredible adventures, and legendary treasures, or ask for help to overcome the quests of the online cooperative multiplayer mode. Join a clan and fight the most epic battles to conquer the dungeons.

Adapt your hero to your gameplay. Turn your Dwarf into an epic warrior, a healer, a hunter or a protector. Train your hero in the adventure quests, and fight other heroes in the online pvp multiplayer arena.

🐲 BUILD YOUR OWN ADVENTURE
It was a long time ago, but Dwarfs remember the Skeleton Boss. He attacked the villages with his army of goblins, skeletons, trolls, and balrogs. But Dwarfs do not surrender, they fear nothing, and they cooperated to hunt their enemies, and battle that army.
Dwarfs defeated the Skeleton Boss, and force him to hide in the ancient Dungeons.

Now, the Skeleton Boss is back.

He is summoning an army to leave his prison, and take revenge on the Dwarfs.
The Skeleton Boss is waiting in his throne, deep in the Dungeons.The only hope for the Dwarfs is to find him, cooperate, and hunt him before he recovers his power.

🔮DISCOVER AN ENDLESS ADVENTURE RPG GAME
Each quest in this Action RPG is unique. Unleash your arcane powers, and hack and slash the evil creatures with a good strategy to obtain legendary rewards. Hunt the evil in the campaign or take part on the multiplayer battles onlines.

⚔️ FIGHT IN THE ONLINE MULTIPLAYER ARENA
Fight epic PvP battles with other heroes, or the online multiplayer modes. Enter the arena alone or with friends, and prove you are the best evil hunter in the dungeons.

🏆 PARTICIPATE IN PVE/PVP EVENTS
Help your fellows dwarves in the PvE events, and compete with them in the PvP battles. Each week there is a new opportunity to prove yourself as the best dwarf.

🎮 ENJOY A TRUE ACTION RPG GAME
This mmorpg controls are designed for touch screens. Hack & Slash game mechanics adapted to mobile devices.

🎁SHARE YOUR ADVENTURES ONLINE
Explore the online multiplayer coop adventures with your friends. Cooperate with other epic heroes online to complete the hardest quests or fight against them in the online multiplayer PvP arena.

⭐️ AWESOME FEATURES:
- Play a true Action RPG adventure
- Enjoy the Hack & Slash mechanics
- Fight in epic multiplayer battles against other heroes online
- Join other heroes to complete the online coop quests
- Play PvP fights in the dungeons
- Participate in weekly PvE events
- Team up with your friends in the online coop adventure
- PvE events, PvP battles, online multiplayer battles, and coop battles can be played for free

If you are looking for a new hack & slash game and mobile action rpg game, this mmorpg adventure game will be your new favourite RPG, action MMO, online RPG, and PvP game. Will you be the best dwarf? Be prepared for amazing boss battles, legendary online PvE quests, coop multiplayer levels full of action, and a new world full of arcane magic.

Please note:
- This epic MMORPG game is free to play, but in-apps items can be purchased with real money. To restrict in-app purchases adjust the settings on your device.
- Dungeon Legends is an online ARPG game, and requires an Internet connection to play.

---
Like the game: http://facebook.com/dungeonlegendsgame
Follow us: http://twitter.com/codigames
Join the Official Forum: http://forum.codigames.com

comments: Okay. This game is VERY visually active, its beautiful, it really is. But there's too much going on. At least on the first (level?), like you cant tell what's coming at you too well. It's all trippy and wavy and lights and everything looks really good, but it almost completely obscures your vision. And I normally don't have problems with that. Ever. But this game man... Its almost not fair, the environment is surrounded with white and red shapes that just float through the air, coincidentally resembling the white squares and red poles that you're supposed to hit/avoid. All you see is a blur of red and white. Maybe you should hit it, maybe you shouldn't. Who the f*** knows...

This game is very amazing, and accurate with everything! The slopes, obstacles, color changes, and the points all seem accurate to any song. Like how it does work with any mp3. Small problems with songs with lyrics, but I do not listen to much of those anyways (I take that back there is no problem actually). It is amazing! I would really be appreciated if you made more styles AbstractArt! Great especially for a unity made mobile game.

When I clicked on the "Music" category, I was very bored. I was not expecting to find a game that perfectly combined my love for good music and video games. From playing mostly idle games and simulation games, this is by far my new favorite and boy am I surprised. I can't wait to throw my most interesting music in. Thank you for making this game.

I love how amazing it looks! I'd love of you added something to change the colors though, as the continuous orange hurts my eyes after a short while. This may sound a bit picky,  but would it be possible to make the game run 60 fps? The low setting runs the same as the high setting for me. Just wondering 🤣

Great. Beautiful menu score. Great levels. I would easily pay $50 for some more levels. Maybe a warrior lady riding a luck dragon from never ending story? Something oozing with 80's. Or a Tron cycle.  Tron like dragon in a flying level.  Please! But yeay this app eats up my time and is very therapeutic.

This game just broke my expectations. I expected another game that claims it adapts to the music and to the beat, but in the end it's just a crappy premade map. Damn I was wrong... I was amazed to see that it really was changing to the music. The art is just so fitting for retrowave music and it makes you fully experience it. The concept is simple, but interesting and it lets you enjoy the ride. I definetly recommend this game to anyone. My only problem is that it has too little content to buy with in-game currency, but it's understandable as it's a new game. I would love more maps, maybe more game modes and obviously more cars. Thanks to the creators of this awesome game. Good job guys.

descriptionHTML:

description: Raft: The Last Maverick – an original story-driven free survival game brought to you by Pride Games Studio, the well-proven survival genre masters. A new action adventure from the creators of Survival Island: Evolved will take you on a ride to the deep ocean waters set in a beautiful steampunk open world. You find yourself as a lone survivor on a raft amidst the endless waters of the Pacific, having to survive bloodthirsty sharks and underwater predators along with hunger, thirst and exhaustion. Explore tropical islands and hidden dungeons, gather resources, craft weapons and armor, upgrade your raft and evolve your hero – fight for your survival! Raft: The Last Maverick brings the survival simulator games to the new level of realism, engagement and fun.Craft! Evolve! Survive! * Survival of the fittest! Do your best to survive – design and upgrade a unique raft and turn it into real shelter. Explore the ocean for useful materials, craft new armor and weapons to fight off primal predators, hunt for food and learn to produce fresh water. Dive into action – everything you do will increase the chances of your survival.* Pimp your Raft! Start with just a small patch of wood that barely keeps your survivor afloat and build, build, build! First set up beds and chairs, then create furnace, workbench, water purifier and tons more of useful constructions. Evolve your building skills well enough and your hero will craft almost anything, even a real ballista to protect your shelter! An impenetrable steampunk fortress or a glamorous hotel with an ocean view – Craft your Raft until it makes you Daft! * The Lord of the Skills! As your hero ventures further into the ocean, you’ll witness him grow, develop and become stronger with each action taken and new level achieved. Let your survivor evolve from a green sailor-boy to the real Pacific Terror! * Blazing Guns of Captain Hook! The endless ocean not only offers stunning views but also holds many dangers. To keep enemies at bay Raft: The Last Maverick gives you a vast arsenal of guns, melee weapons and other means to defend your floating shelter. If you run out of anything, the trusty hook will always come in handy to reach far off crafting and building materials without the need to roleplay as a shark bait! * Raft Fiction! Follow the enticing story of The Last Maverick. Complete quests, look for other survivors, face brutal betrayals and bizarre plot-twists, form strong bonds with unlikely allies and craft your own destiny. Put all your strength to achieve the final goal – reaching the New World. If you play your cards right and manage to survive long enough you’ll be the one to uncover the mystery behind the unfortunate shipwreck. What at first seemed as just a coincidence might turn out into the meanest deception the steampunk world has seen! * Three men in a Raft! Multiplayer mode coming soon! Once you feel confident in your skills and evolve past the beginners point, you’ll be ready to join forces with your friends online to add even more brutal action to your adventure. Team up with other players online in the multiplayer mode, decide if you wish to save them from starvation or rob them of their last means for survival. Multiplayer will bring a new thrill even to the most weathered Heroes of the ocean!Join us: https://www.facebook.com/thelastmaverickgame

description: Play a variety of quirky mini-games in Frantics™ on PlayStation®4 with this Frantics™ Companion App.Challenge your friends and family in everything from crazy arena brawls to wacky races for up to four players. Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware – he’s helping them too!It’s easy to join in – just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. You may even find that the Fox calls you for secret missions...Make sure your PS4™ console is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.Use this app to:•	Choose an animal to play as and shake your device to randomize it.•	Snap a selfie to show who’s who in the game.•	Play nice or sabotage other players in mini-games using your own screen. •	Receive texts and calls from the Fox to help you win.This application can be used in the following languages:English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Finnish, Mexican Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.PlayLink for PS4™ titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. playstation.com/playlinkforps4This app turns your device into a controller. PS4™ console, Frantics™ and the Frantics™ Companion App are required to play. PS4™ console and Frantics™ are sold separately.The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use of this app, depending on your country of residence:playstation.com/legal/software-usage-terms/
descriptionHTML:
Play a variety of quirky mini-games in Frantics™ on PlayStation®4 with this Frantics™ Companion App.

Challenge your friends and family in everything from crazy arena brawls to wacky races for up to four players. Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware – he’s helping them too!

It’s easy to join in – just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. You may even find that the Fox calls you for secret missions...

Make sure your PS4™ console is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.

Use this app to:
• Choose an animal to play as and shake your device to randomize it.
• Snap a selfie to show who’s who in the game.
• Play nice or sabotage other players in mini-games using your own screen.
• Receive texts and calls from the Fox to help you win.

This application can be used in the following languages:
English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Finnish, Mexican Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

PlayLink for PS4™ titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. playstation.com/playlinkforps4

This app turns your device into a controller. PS4™ console, Frantics™ and the Frantics™ Companion App are required to play. PS4™ console and Frantics™ are sold separately.

The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use of this app, depending on your country of residence:
playstation.com/legal/software-usage-terms/

description: Remark: The game language itself is German, but most words are still in English, and most functionalities are easy to guess. There will be an “all-English” update in the future, but feel free to race for your personal best time with this version already. #unraceable icebox - Create it, feel it!#unraceable #icebox turns you into a track designer in a playful way: You build your own track with your own hands directly at the #unraceable #table into a real snow slope - incl. Inclines, curves, archways, ski jumps, finishing line, blue slope markings and so on.The finished racing track will then be scanned and completed to a revolutionary 3D virtual reality landscape that you can drive in either in the #unraceable simulator, or at home via “Audi #unraceable” app. This is where the adventure starts: With the VR glasses, you experience the virtual car race on your personal route sitting on a Motion Seat in real time. Emotional, real, tangible: the Motion Seat transmits speed, braking- and physical forces up to 2G directly to the player in a perfect simulation. Check out the current location of the seat at www.unraceable.at.Take it, enjoy it, share it!The mobile app gives you the unique opportunity to take your individual racetrack back home with you on your smartphone, to experience it over and over again and to further improve your personal top performance. You can challenge your friends via Facebook on your track and rate the tracks of other friends. Your track will also be sent to you by E-mail including a photo of your performance in the Motion Seat.How are you able to share your track with friends? The image of your racetrack will include a code: If you enter this code in the app, your track will be publicly available for everyone to race on. When a friend shares his "skiing adventure", you will have the opportunity to accept the challenge and beat your friend's time with this track-code. Moreover: As a logged-in Facebook user you will be able to see the shared routes of your friends on an extra tab.The ultimate Special: Beat the stars!An absolute highlight are the star specials from #unraceable. For example, you will be able to challenge various stars on their tracks. The master track of the 6-time overall World Cup winner and Audi brand ambassador Marcel Hirscher is certainly the ultimate challenge. Hirscher's best time is the benchmark for all challengers and gives you the chance to get your personal bonus for your Audi. The faster you are mastering Marcel Hirscher's racetrack, the more bonus (up to 2,000 €!) you will receive - applicable for a new Audi “Jungwagen”. Simple as that. It is worth it, because there are only 100 bonuses available! Start against the World Cup winner as often as you like - but only your best time will count! But be careful: This bonus expires by the end of this year (2017).Your individual upgradeBeing a top performer pays off: #unraceable #icebox offers you the opportunity to earn "Audi Credits" on all racetracks. These credits are the currency that gives you unbeatable advantages when choosing a vehicle. This lets you for example upgrade your Audi A3 to an S3 and subsequently to an RS3 – with each upgrade the vehicle is getting faster and thereby improves your performance while hunting for extra bonus points. Audi Credits can be collected with jumps, drifts and other furious driving maneuvers.
descriptionHTML:
Remark: The game language itself is German, but most words are still in English, and most functionalities are easy to guess. There will be an “all-English” update in the future, but feel free to race for your personal best time with this version already.

#unraceable icebox - Create it, feel it!

#unraceable #icebox turns you into a track designer in a playful way: You build your own track with your own hands directly at the #unraceable #table into a real snow slope - incl. Inclines, curves, archways, ski jumps, finishing line, blue slope markings and so on.
The finished racing track will then be scanned and completed to a revolutionary 3D virtual reality landscape that you can drive in either in the #unraceable simulator, or at home via “Audi #unraceable” app. This is where the adventure starts: With the VR glasses, you experience the virtual car race on your personal route sitting on a Motion Seat in real time. Emotional, real, tangible: the Motion Seat transmits speed, braking- and physical forces up to 2G directly to the player in a perfect simulation. Check out the current location of the seat at www.unraceable.at.
Take it, enjoy it, share it!

The mobile app gives you the unique opportunity to take your individual racetrack back home with you on your smartphone, to experience it over and over again and to further improve your personal top performance. You can challenge your friends via Facebook on your track and rate the tracks of other friends. Your track will also be sent to you by E-mail including a photo of your performance in the Motion Seat.
How are you able to share your track with friends? The image of your racetrack will include a code: If you enter this code in the app, your track will be publicly available for everyone to race on. When a friend shares his "skiing adventure", you will have the opportunity to accept the challenge and beat your friend's time with this track-code. Moreover: As a logged-in Facebook user you will be able to see the shared routes of your friends on an extra tab.

The ultimate Special: Beat the stars!

An absolute highlight are the star specials from #unraceable. For example, you will be able to challenge various stars on their tracks. The master track of the 6-time overall World Cup winner and Audi brand ambassador Marcel Hirscher is certainly the ultimate challenge. Hirscher's best time is the benchmark for all challengers and gives you the chance to get your personal bonus for your Audi. The faster you are mastering Marcel Hirscher's racetrack, the more bonus (up to 2,000 €!) you will receive - applicable for a new Audi “Jungwagen”. Simple as that. It is worth it, because there are only 100 bonuses available! Start against the World Cup winner as often as you like - but only your best time will count! But be careful: This bonus expires by the end of this year (2017).

Your individual upgrade

Being a top performer pays off: #unraceable #icebox offers you the opportunity to earn "Audi Credits" on all racetracks. These credits are the currency that gives you unbeatable advantages when choosing a vehicle. This lets you for example upgrade your Audi A3 to an S3 and subsequently to an RS3 – with each upgrade the vehicle is getting faster and thereby improves your performance while hunting for extra bonus points. Audi Credits can be collected with jumps, drifts and other furious driving maneuvers.

description: Integrate yourself into a world of high stakes deception and heart pumping action when you download, Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break. It's time to run, shoot and dodge fellow inmates and vicious prison guards. Feel the danger as you blast through three intense landscapes and enjoy amazing 3D graphics and pixel game animations. Download for FREE today and experience a classic block game for the ages.The Underbelly of the Justice System...Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man has been locked away behind bars at a super-max penitentiary, his termination imminent. He insists he's innocent, but there is no proof or ounce of human-compassion to support his claim. This man, is you. Meanwhile, his absence from the capitol has opened up the seat to a demonical politician whose corrupt beliefs have the capability of upturning a nation. Time is of the Essence... It's time to take drastic measures and claim your own freedom and prove your innocence before the government is overtaken by double crossing politicians and the nation as you know it is turned upside-down. Think Strategically, Fight for Survival...When the time is right, you make a break for it, knowing the inner workings of the system. Understanding this will be no easy task, but an exhausting feat of brute and intelligence, you begin the fight for your life. Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break is a challenging first person shooter action game that is a thrill a minute experience. From the collection of hidden melee and firearm weapons and the scattering of helpful pickups to the mobs of savage enemies and the tricky landscapes, this game is ripe with intense play. Enjoy intuitive controls and massive levels that boast dangerous battles that will require quick thinking and fast reflexes. Fight your way against dozens of foes and take control over the justice system as you battle your way to freedom. The fight starts now. Characteristics: Hidden melee & firearm weapons. Collect health and ammo pickups as you explore your surroundings. Prepare for enemies to increase as levels progress. Interactive map. Choose from a variety of weapons. Expansive levels to explore.

Police Robot Car Game – Police Plane Transport is a brand new edition to the police robot games from the city of New York with US police transform robot. NYPD police and LAPD has collaborated a secret police mission to transform robot car into police robot transforming bots to root out crime from their cities. Transport robot car and bike in police truck to airport and then fly cargo plane as an airplane pilot to the secret island where NYPD police research center is located. comments: Ridiculiusly easy and short. Read few comments and must agree - you either see the path from the very start or just randomly stumble upon the flag at the end. only thing thats challenging are the controls, rotation and light/shading. ultra annoying in few last stages.

Looks like monument Valley, but nowhere near as challenging. The most difficult thing is getting the controls to work - the character movement doesn't flow, and it's near impossible to get it to recognise the two finger swipes for rotation. Once you get the hang of it the puzzles are just not challenging enough.

I downloaded this thinking it would be kind of like Monument valley, but ended up being really disappointed. There's really no difficulty to it- the only chance you'd be confused is when you think it would be difficult but it ends up being easy. The graphics LOOK ok, but the animations are really slow and unfitting to the style. Eh, don't recommend.
I will have to upgrade to the paid version for new levels. I had fun going through the free version. Stage 1 was pretty easy but stage 2 began getting harder and harder. Loved it

I'm stuck at number 20 because he won't move in the direction I need. I got a hint to be sure but, even the arrow pointed the way he won't move. It's like he's walking into a wall that isn't there. It's disappointing because, with better controls, and different shading of the planes (checkerboard makes it confusing. Shades if solid colors is ideal with perspective, especially forced)...this game is addictive and extremely likeable. But, I had to give mist if it 2 stars, and that was generous. I hope to be able to update it soon.

This game is okay for killing time, but others definitely take priorty over it. It's simple, but not in a good way. The only things that make the levels hard to complete shouldn't even be a factor. The colors can make it hard to tell what you are looking at half the time. When you turn the level it won't go a full 360 without some weird manuevering making it hard to keep track of what you're doing. Sometimes it takes a couple tries to get the character to move insread of walking in place. And some obstacles that you can move over in some places, it doesn't let you in others.  So in general, the majority of the time you spend completing each level is comprised of overcoming the issues with the game, and not based on difficulty. Like I said, if you have nothing else to play, it's a good time killer. Otherwise, I'm not a huge fan.

comments: I play this game regularly, and I enjoy the differing modes available. You can play happily without paying for any additional content, however at higher levels paying will help you progress. By this time you will have poured hours into it, so I do not think it is unreasonable. Save your gold until later levels (player level 15+) and you can get by without in game purchases for quite a while.

I absolutely love this game. Turn based tactics are one of my favourite types of games. Since playing the game more I've decided that there's not enough gas for me to be able to enjoy the game like I want to. I think the car should either hold more, or gas should be easier to get. This is just a game that already has inconsistencies with reality. Otherwise I love the game

Just loved it... I am at council level 18 now... Weapon upgrade xp cost should be reduced or just remove workshop. No use of WORKSHOP with such high xp cost because its REASONABLE to upgrade your SURVIVOR than their WEAPONS.... Please for next update reduce weapon upgrade cost....

Great game, been playing for five months now and have managed to get all but 5 hero's unlocked. Lots of chances to save up radios for hero calls and love the different types of game especially the guild.  Haven't spent a penny on it and don't think you need to if you have a little patience and use your resources wisely.

I have this game, and I play this more than watching the actual show. You can bring together a motley crew of survivors for missions and get gear to make them stronger. Build a camp, in order to multiply resources, because you will need them to improve other buildings. Also, to note, this game will not allow you to get stronger unless you improve your camp. I have survivors who cannot level up until I Improve the council. The training grounds will not be built any further unless you improve the council. Its like a city/fort building game with tactical rpg feel to it.  There is a leaderboard, that actually awards you for being at a certain tier. You can join guilds to help get better gear. I love this game!  ...The con that I have with this is that every time of logging on, deals are thrown in my face, and it is enticing too.

I've been playing this game for two years now and I can never put it down. It's such an amazing game. I'd like it even more though if the characters we originally fell in love with were available. Like Andrea, T-Dog, Lori, etc.
description: Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle. • FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead • JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - GamezeboFor more, please visit:http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomanslandhttp://twitter.com/twdnomanslandhttp://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.comhttp://www.youtube.com/nxtgmsFor player support, please visit:nextgames.helpshift.com
descriptionHTML:
Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo
