description: Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.Features:▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.

Features:
▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!
▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!
▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking
▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!
▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!

Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.

Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.

Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!

descriptionHTML:
- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration - one of the best pixelated games in the first-person mode, time-tested! This game will not leave you indifferent and will present many interesting subjects and opportunities.

This game is created in the style of a sandbox with an open world, in which the player does not have any specific goals. You choose what to do in this game.

Explore the endless world of blocks and cubes. The most interesting war against zombies at night. Crafting and gathering, survival and building. And much much much more ...

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration provides the player with a three-dimensional generated world, entirely consisting of cubic blocks. This world you can freely rebuild, creating from the blocks of complex structures.

Features:

*** Easy operation and unrivaled interface
*** A lot of game modes of the game.
*** Numerous types of weapons for your taste.
*** Zombies and fighting with them.
*** The most diverse construction. Even more possibilities for creativity without limits.
*** Beautiful pixel graphics Super HD. Very beautiful texture in high resolution.
*** High FPS, without compromise.
*** For children and adults.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game has three modes.

Survival mode.
In this mode, you must extract natural resources (wood and stone, various minerals). Of these, you can build a variety of tools, blocks and elements. In the dark hours of the day there are dangerous monsters and zombies.

Creativity.
In this mode, you have unlimited access to all things, things, and building blocks. You can instantly destroy any blocks.

Multiplayer mode.
The name of this regime speaks for itself. Play with your friends and win.

- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

The game is developed by a professional team of developers with the involvement of design, rezhsure and sound specialists.

The pixel world is waiting for you!

description: Ready to drive big offroad trucks in one of the best 6x6 driving simulator games! Take control of 6x6 offroad trucks (4x4 trucks with more wheels!) in a huge offroad mountain environment: 16 km² area, 30 km of roads!Accomplish tons of unique missions to be a top offroad truck driver! !! Truck Driver 6x6 Hill Driving contains action packed 20 truck driving missions !!Get right into the driving action and become the 6x6 truck driver, drive some seriously big vehicles in one of the best driving simulators in 6x6 offroad trucks. Experience driving specially modified trucks, with 6x6 all-terrain driving, you can conquer driving anywhere offroad in the most realistic driving simulator game!Explore the massive open world map with your own 6x6 offroad truck, filled with loads exciting places to visit. Beautiful vistas in one of the best truck driving simulators. Like a waterfall cascade and a lake, an ancient temple, a small airport, countryside houses and farms, ruins, camping places, and more... Drive on roads that vary from 2x2 lanes to very small dirt road up mountains, with a hill climb driving experience waiting for you.Example of missions :- Tow broke down 4x4 trucks offroad- Transport important cargo across the country- Race at speed to get through speed traps- Rescue injured climbers up mountain hill climbs- Stop and catch all the gangsters with your SUV- Protect your terrain from wolves- Avoid without hitting the boars and barrels- Drive on tricky obstacle courses as fast as possible- And a whole load more!!Features :- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains, and forests- Realistic 6x6 truck driving simulator- Realistic off-road truck driving physics- High-quality 6x6 trucks and vehicles- Dynamic camera angles, control any angle!- Easy to play truck driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.
descriptionHTML:
Ready to drive big offroad trucks in one of the best 6x6 driving simulator games! Take control of 6x6 offroad trucks (4x4 trucks with more wheels!) in a huge offroad mountain environment: 16 km² area, 30 km of roads!
Accomplish tons of unique missions to be a top offroad truck driver!

!! Truck Driver 6x6 Hill Driving contains action packed 20 truck driving missions !!

Get right into the driving action and become the 6x6 truck driver, drive some seriously big vehicles in one of the best driving simulators in 6x6 offroad trucks. Experience driving specially modified trucks, with 6x6 all-terrain driving, you can conquer driving anywhere offroad in the most realistic driving simulator game!

Explore the massive open world map with your own 6x6 offroad truck, filled with loads exciting places to visit. Beautiful vistas in one of the best truck driving simulators.
Like a waterfall cascade and a lake, an ancient temple, a small airport, countryside houses and farms, ruins, camping places, and more...
Drive on roads that vary from 2x2 lanes to very small dirt road up mountains, with a hill climb driving experience waiting for you.

Example of missions :
- Tow broke down 4x4 trucks offroad
- Transport important cargo across the country
- Race at speed to get through speed traps
- Rescue injured climbers up mountain hill climbs
- Stop and catch all the gangsters with your SUV
- Protect your terrain from wolves
- Avoid without hitting the boars and barrels
- Drive on tricky obstacle courses as fast as possible
- And a whole load more!!

Features :
- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains, and forests
- Realistic 6x6 truck driving simulator
- Realistic off-road truck driving physics
- High-quality 6x6 trucks and vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles, control any angle!
- Easy to play truck driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!

You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.

description: This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns. Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.  You really don't want to miss these cool features presented by this hair styling game:- Free to play- Pretty easy to handle the control- Entertain yourself with quality music and nice graphics- Be a hairstylist as good as you can be in the braided area- Multitude of processes to accomplish- Take care of a dehydrated hair and cut the damaged hair yarns- Put together the strands that needs to be taken for a well executed braid- Moisturize the hair with a home made mask that you are making
descriptionHTML:
This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns.

Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.

You really don't want to miss these cool features presented by this hair styling game:
- Free to play
- Pretty easy to handle the control
- Entertain yourself with quality music and nice graphics
- Be a hairstylist as good as you can be in the braided area
- Multitude of processes to accomplish
- Take care of a dehydrated hair and cut the damaged hair yarns
- Put together the strands that needs to be taken for a well executed braid
- Moisturize the hair with a home made mask that you are making

description: Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love. You can draw straight onto canvas or choose a background or character to color in. Peppa and George will pop in from time to time to see how you are getting on and once you are done drawing, you can have your very own exhibition at Peppa's school! Features: 7 paintbrush colors 7 paint tin colors 39 character and prop stickers 10 animated stickers 6 magical drawing tools 3 Peppa backgrounds 3 characters to color in Eraser Choose to play with Peppa or George Exhibition space on the wall at Peppa's school Save your drawing to camera roll No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of painting fun!
descriptionHTML:
Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love.

You can draw straight onto canvas or choose a background or character to color in. Peppa and George will pop in from time to time to see how you are getting on and once you are done drawing, you can have your very own exhibition at Peppa's school!

Features:

7 paintbrush colors
7 paint tin colors
39 character and prop stickers
10 animated stickers
6 magical drawing tools
3 Peppa backgrounds
3 characters to color in
Eraser
Choose to play with Peppa or George
Exhibition space on the wall at Peppa's school
Save your drawing to camera roll
No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of painting fun!
summary: Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans!
title: Peppa Pig: Paintbox

Otherwise i think the game is awesome. I cleaned my room up today so my mum and dad decided i could get the full version and i cant wait. On the full version it stops all the adds!! It even lets you have all the items and stuff that are locked. I rate this game a twenty out of twenty because of the full version. 👍

How the hell are y'all going to take Hip-Hop, a movement started by black and brown youths, and not put any people of color in the game??  And the icing on the cake is that the white people have dreadlocks. What the ****. A beautiful movement started by black and brown youths in the 70's as a response to the systemic oppression they faced has once again been co-opted for profit, and it's not even done with the right people. And I know for sure that none of y'all can tell me what the four elements of Hip-Hop are. This game is a sick, culturally appropriative joke.
I AM ADDICTED TO THIS GAME. I just can't seem to stop playing. But it also has too many adds other than that the game is great.  graphics, controls, music, moves, and style is perfect😍💓💯✨

Pls.  take care

description: Gangsters Of San Andreas is the realistic crime simulator game which is full of exciting crime missions for you to complete. Be a street thug crime lord of a gang and find and defeat the member of your rival gang and become the mafia man you were destined to become. Snatch new luxury sports cars from passer by drivers and drive them as your own. Beware police are hot on your tracks so be ready to evade the police by driving your car in tight corners and escaping the helicopter in the sky. Please feel free to suggest us any improvements that could help us make the game better. Thank You!

descriptionHTML:
Take part in one of the BattleMinibots armoured car shows – spectacular robots fighting games of armoured car and robot warriors radio-guided vehicles. These indestructible battle cars are extremely dangerous, each with its unique weapon for death racing. Create your own armoured car minibot in the garage and upgrade its properties to make it to the try-out and become a member of the mech robot wars League!

Enjoy watching steel robot fighting BattleBots and armoured car Robot Wars shows? Always dreamed of creating your own indestructible battle cars robot and building a team to take part in the death racing show? With Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots robots fighting games ANYONE can be part of robot warriors and armoured car wars game – this car battle is thrilling, and it's free!

Drive to the steel robot fighting arena and be ready for the most breathtaking car wars game with death racing! These robots vs robots car battles are something really amazing!

Face the most powerful death racing super mechs. You're going to deal with them in mech robot wars:
Excabot
Drillbot
Smile minibomb
Sawbot
Nailthrower, and other machines for car battle!

Complete super mechs tasks and earn great rewards. Get improving weapons (flame-thrower, magnets, taser, saws etc), armour to protect minibot’s body. Find the best equipment for the minibot and create your own destruction machine. There are new minibots for your collection!

Fight with your super mechs on multiple battle arena locations with additional obstacles – traps, spike strips, kill saws, hell raisers, ramrods, etc. Interact with objects on the battle arena (crates, fire extinguishers) and learn how to use the traps in your favour. Earn experience points in robots fighting games and get access to minibot customization – new armour, weapons and styles for more breathtaking car wars game.

And remember: the more achievements you unlock, the better, as only the most persistent players will join the mech robot wars League. Let the car wars game start!
Activate your VIP-status, to unlock more game abilities.

Robot warriors war: be #1 in our worldwide leaderboard!

Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots is:

15+ robot warrior and super mechs with unique fighting mechanics, for extreme machines games
Personalization with the help of armour and weapons
Mighty iron warriors and thrilling robots vs robots PvP battle arena fights.

Breathtaking robots vs robots fights are waiting for you. Choose machines for a steel robot fighting and go to the battle arena!

Already playing Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots? Discuss the game and share your opinion in social networks:

on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/robotfighting2/

We look forward to your comments and suggestions for improving the game.

description: Practice athletic winter sports in a realistic 3D environment through 34 events and 8 competitions ! Challenge the computer or play against friends to beat records all around the world ! You will evolve through detailed and realistic environment with animations to celebrate your records. The game includes music and special crowd sound effects. GAMEPLAY Athletics Winter Sports provides an intuitive gameplay system for both beginners and experienced players. It requires fast fingers, impeccable timing, and smart strategy to defeat your opponents and claim a medal. description: Play The Official Higher Lower Game! As seen on www.higherlowergame.com Refugee Crisis vs Donald Trump. Starbucks vs Kim Kardashian. Which gets Googled more? Put yourself to the test and see if you know which are the most popular search trends on Google. Do you like quiz, trivia games? Then this is the game for you! It’s easy to play, simply decide which search term has been searched for the most by selecting higher or lower. The objective is to get the most right in a row. The game has been played over 5 million times with YouTube star PewDiePie creating a video of himself playing the game. It’s the perfect quiz to kill time and can also be used as a drinking game. Download now.

description: Play a soccer match at the beach under the sun. Shoot balls to the goal avoiding the goalkeeper or the obstacles. Multiply your score passing the ball through the rings or hitting the poles. In the very first levels the goalkeeper is a noob but as you pass levels it will get harder to score goals. Be ready to challenge yourself against other player in the tournament and you will get a cup fragment. When you complete the cup you will start the second road to another soccer cup.Play in career mode, in which you will have to win the beach soccer championship, with over 150 levels that will force you to show that you are the best soccer player, and the best in free kicks and penalties. In this soccer game, you also have a new soccer mode of challenges, in which you must complete some soccer challenges and get the victory to get a great reward, show that you are capable of achieving them and become the best soccer player of history!In this soccer game:★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Show your skills shooting goals from the penalty point.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Avoid the players wall to score like the best football players in the world.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Compete in the beach soccer league and get all the cup fragments.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Take down all the boxes in a funny game mode.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Enhance your player skills like ball effect, power or accuracy.Shoot Goal Beach Soccer 2018 is the best beach soccer game! This game is completely free but you can make some purchases to level up your player skills or game assets. comments: Awesome game! Love the art, love the music, love the style, and the gameplay is actually challenging enough to hold my attention but not enough to be irritating. Perfect difficulty. Not to mention the colorblind mode actually works. I know this is receiving a lot of criticism, but I love the option you guys gave with ads and how well you executed it, that was a very nice touch. You really outdid yourselves with this one!

A very decent small game. I don't know what other people are complaining about but you can play the game without paying. The music is nice the graphics is nice it's easy to play. I hope there more levels in the future as this is such a fun game. Very nice one from the team at noodlecake Studios. Kudos my n*****

Really fun game, but once you've got a couple colors going, it doesn't like to click the changer buttons. It also doesn't like when you click the buttons while you're moving. Lots of potential here (Currently at 1000 downloads, so I feel like it's still working out the kinks)

Pretty decent game, couple of suggestions though: instead of limiting lives to a paywall, why not use opt-in ads which we can click to respawn the character? Also, it'd be better if instead of two movement buttons placed on only one side of the screen, why not make either sides of the screen be for forward move through right screen and backward move through left, and double click for removing the hindrances? Just my two cents, but overall it's a nice game to kill time
The lives rate behind a paywall is a joke.  Nothing but a money grab.  I will be removing the game
Add restart button inside the lvls plz! It will disappear if z time runs out. Thnks

description: Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.Good luck and have a fun!
descriptionHTML:
Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.
The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.

In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.


Good luck and have a fun!

This is a special sequel! A horse braided hair spa salon! How great is that? Now you can give the pony a special braided hairstyle and be a hairdresser for horses! For now you can braid the mane of the horse and later we can do braiding of the pony tail. Brush the horse mane and follow the tutorial to make the most beautiful hairdos for ponies you have learned on horse camp. The most horse riders love also to do the hair of your pony and make good hairdos. Be an amazon but first you go braiding the manes in different braids and hairstyles. For now you only can make normal braids with button braids or you also can call it knob braids. Later we will add: french braid, continental braid and scalloped mane. There are so many different braids and hairstyles for horses, you want to learn it all! Here you can learn the hairdos and later you can make those braids by your own horse or pony. Now you can give the pony a special braided hairstyle and be a hairdresser for horses! For now you can braid the mane of the horse and later we can do braiding of the pony tail. Brush the horse mane and follow the tutorial to make the most beautiful hairdos for ponies you have learned on horse camp. The most horse riders love also to do the hair of your pony and make good hairdos. Be an amazon but first you go braiding the manes in different braids and hairstyles. For now you only can make normal braids with button braids or you also can call it knob braids. Later we will add: french braid, continental braid and scalloped mane. There are so many different braids and hairstyles for horses, you want to learn it all! Here you can learn the hairdos and later you can make those braids by your own horse or pony. It’s a sort of beauty salon but then in the stable for your pony.


Features of Horse Care - Mane Braiding:
❤ Learn different and beautiful braid hair cuts
❤ Become a hairdresser for ponies
❤ A hair salon game for ponies in the stable!
❤ We will update the game with more different braid hairstyles
❤ Take care of your own horses, brush and bread the hair
❤ Give your horse your own name!
❤ Buy new horses with different colors!
❤ Easy to play for all kids


Every equestrian needs to know how to brush, braid and make a bun or knotted up the mane of your horse. You can learn it at your riding school, horse camp or in this game!


Horse Care - Mane Braiding is a game from Top Girl games and one of the virtual horse braiding games of 2016. We publish many different easy to play girl games apps. We hope you will enjoy our Horse Care - Mane Braiding game and we hope you give us the love by liking our Facebook page or follow us on twitter or Instagram. So we can keep you up to date on our horses, hairdresser, pony and unicorns games.
★ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/LadiesDressUp
★ Twitter - https://twitter.com/ladiesdressup
★ Instagram - https://instagram.com/TopGirlGames

description: Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist Build your own world in this strategy war game! War and Order is the perfect fusion of real time strategy, tower defense, and castle building games and has received several Global Google Recommendations. Orcs, elves, and mages are yours to command in a gorgeous 3D medieval game world. Raise a massive fantasy army for HUGE fully animated battles. Clash with enemies from all over the world in real-time! Choose your alliance and take castles, slay monsters, and stake new territory as a tribe! This is WAR, and there’s never a dull moment as your screen lights up with constant new battles, chats, and upgrades!You must battle to become more powerful than any king in history in this dangerous war game. It’s up to you, your strategy, and your allies to conquer an endless world of empires and imagination.★HOMELAND• Recruit and train over 50 fantasy soldiers, uniting Orcs, Elves, Humans, Mages, Beasts, and Angels.• Your ultimate building game: Construct and upgrade tons of buildings for new soldiers, buffs, and resources!• Research new magic and technology FAST for cutting-edge tactics and weapons!★ALLIANCE• Friend, feud, and chat with players from around the world in real time. • Fight and build together to conquer enemies and build castles you could never hold alone.• Share and expand territory for exclusive bonuses! • But remember! This is a war strategy game. Drive carefully to the pick up spot, open the bus doors, let the passengers board the bus and then drop them to their destination. Drive carefully because every time you crash into traffic your bus will get damaged and the passengers will be hurt! Make sure you drop your passengers before your bus is completely broken and damaged!

Change the camera view as per your comfort to the sturdy exterior or the realistic plush interiors.
Play the career mode of this truck simulator, make money and purchase new trucks and upgrades

Bus Simulator 2018: City Driving FEATURES
- Real life traffic
- Beautiful city environment
- Challenging missions
- Different grand buses to drive
- Realistic bus physics
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Realistic bus interiors
- Realistic game sound effects
- Easy steering wheel, buttons and tilting controls
- Fresh attractive music

Explore the beautiful city in your bus and become the king of the road!
Get Bus Simulator 2018: City Driving now!
summary: Become the best Bus Driver! Drive a big bus in the beautiful city!
title: Bus Simulator 2018: City Driving

comments: Awesome game. Very nice controls but greedy devs. I spend money in games but to pay 59 sek just to remove ads is too much. And too many ads which spoils the otherwise great game. Either reduce the cost to remove ads or include other benefits to the same cost. The frequency of ads should be reduced.

Fun gameplay, but a bit buggy and confusing when a train is near a switch since you often stop a train when trying to switch it. Difficulty ramps up to insanely unfair after the first few levels. Since the passengers spawn at random even when you're absolutely perfect at switching the trains you still don't often get 3 stars on the level. Getting 3 stars on a level is basically luck at that point.

This game was great for the first few levels, and then some frustrations set in about the design. Some levels are just tough to see which tracks go where because of the nature of the isometric view, but the real deal breaker for me is having to click the arrow to switch a track path. Why can't this be a lever to the side of the track, especially when two path switches overlap? Countless times I've accidentally stopped a train on an intersection instead of switching the track for the next train. It tests your patience instead of your multitasking and tracking abilities. The ads are very, very plentiful. I urge you to continue using the free version if you want to support the devs because they probably get more revenue from ads in the long run than the $5 cost to remove the ads. Potentially great.

Rigged gameplay. I made it thru several levels until I tapped on the train and it didnt stop, resulting in a crash, further resulting in a 30 second ad that I couldn't escape. How convenient. I have noticed more and more developers finding ever-newer ways to slip ads into the games.

This game was honestly amazing. I love how it's such a simple game yet it's so much fun to play. The low poly graphics and the music really synchronized and make it so much more better. Even the tutorial, it integrates into the game in a very interesting manner. The only problem was that it lags a bit, but otherwise Northplay, loved it!
Hadn't played it for a while, went back and it had deleted all my progress. Not going to start again, so deleting the app
description: Conduct THIS! Is an adictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.  Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.  As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.  • Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds • Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches • Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions • Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection • Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit • Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ • Share your most explosive crashes with your friends • Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon Kölle

comments: I think it is a very good game. But i have a few suggestions that you can make to the game. First you should make it where it shift from daytime to nighttime and when it is on nightime you have the choice to turn on the turn on the headlights. Also you should make it where you have 2 different driving controls. Like you should keep the arrows and add a steering wheel. Also, you guys should add a horn with one of the button options. You guys should also make it where you can ride with other people. One last thing guys you should add a boat people can get on and ride. Please add all of this you guys are awesome!

This is a great game for hanging out, practising quick-scoping and all-round fun. I just feel that you guys haven't put enough effort into this, like you just put something down and left it. People love this game! You need to start making it betterand adding new content, or else people will just get bored. But otherwise, it's great for just having fun killing other people ;)

Can you have us have a friend's list to see who's online I bet  that's what people like me want. Also there's  seats in the vehicle. can you make it were  people for the other person .And last can you make a gas bar were we  refill has with our money that would be cool with a update of a donate Bar were in the server we can donate bet. And add newer cars and guns it's fun but and the same time it's boring plz do these.!!!!!!!!!!!

Pretty good game, though there should be a higher emphasis on fighting. We should be able to register accounts, and receive money for our kills. Also, when we kill someone, it should say in chat who we killed. Game has great potential, registering accounts would be nice to so that we can make friends and remember people. :D

I love the game, it is a great time killer, but I have suggestions. First you should add more guns, like pistols, and add grenades. Also have the plane controls more easier to use, I always have difficulty with that. Add more maps, more planes to fly. Make it so it can save the cars or planes you get. I always lose money buying the same car again every time I log back in the game. Other than that, I love the game!

Make a option where you can choose your sensitivity. The sniper Scope is harder to you in with the new one. Make more guns in the game. Finally when you stay still in the game: people, cars, move which makes it harder to shoot. One you run over a player they should die. Please add these stuff to the game for a 5 star rating.

comments: So lovely! Good game. You can easily make money and food, breeding and nurturing are pretty fast, unlike other games where you'd have to wait 24 hours or more for things to be done. And I was never able to watch videos for free packs.That is sad, but other than that this game really deserves 5 stars.

I got this game a couple of weeks ago and with the newest update, I can't do anything. Any time I try to click on a dog, the oven to get food, or anywhere, nothing happens. It's frustrating and I don't want to get rid of this game. Fix this problem please, I am too far in this game to restart.
Really like the game but the spin wheel is a joke. Total waste of gems getting the same result each time you try again. Impossible to get more than a 2 star dog. Getting annoyed! Seems rigged to me!

The game itself is fun and i like it, but its way to hard to get tokens to buy dog cards. Especially when one dog card can cost 1,000 or more tokens. Right now I'm stuck in the main quests because i can't level my dogs up enough because I can't get enough tokens without paying real money.
Its an awesome game. Way better than i expected. So easy to earn things and breed etc. The only problem i got right now is that it wont load for some reason. But will keep trying

description: Dog Town is a FREE pet caring simulation game where you can collect dog cards and dogs like: basset hound, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Great Dane, Shnauzer, Cocker Spaniel, French Bulldog, Pomeranian, Doberman, Siberian Husky, Miniature Pinscher, Labrador, Beagle, Chihuahua, Corgi, Dachshund and other dog breeds with a large emphasis on Dog Collection and management for casual and midcore players. Players will collect dogs, train them to level them up and send them to quests for exciting in-game rewards! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with puppies was interested in pet rescue this is one of the best pet games for you. With the ability to customize the rooms where their dogs will live we've put tremendous amount of effort to ensure that players would feel attached to their dogs just like they would to the real ones.In coming updates we will bring more dog cards for cute puppies and dogs to groom and breed like Dachshund, Corgi , Chihuahua, Labrador, Beagle, Miniature Pinscher, Siberian Husky, Doberman, Pomeranian, French Bulldog, Cocker Spaniel, Shnauzer, Great Dane, Bull Terrier, Yorkshire Terrier, Australian Shepherd, Labrador Retriever, Boston Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, basset hound and many others puppies! Each dog will have a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! And what's better is that the game is in full 3D and a planned VR support coming in future updates will ensure that the immersion to the Dog Town is always at high levels!Start collecting your dogs now and show your own collection to the world!FEATURES★ Gorgeous 3D environment! ★ Realistic Dogs with lifelike behavior! ★ Breed and groom your own Dog Collection!★ Level up your dogs and send them to quests!★ Decorate your rooms with hundreds of decorations!★ More than 60 dogs to collect and more to come!PLEASE NOTE!This game is still in early development.And a network connection is required.UPCOMING FEATURES● Interaction with the dogs● Translation (German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese and few more)● More dogs and decorations● Backyard / Minigames ● Dog dressup and competition with friendsUpcoming dog breeds: basset hound, Dachshund, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Chihuahua, Corgi, Labrador, Beagle, Springer Spaniel, Miniature Pinscher, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Siberian Husky, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Doberman,  Bull Terrier, Pomeranian,  Great Dane, Shnauzer, French Bulldog,  Cocker Spaniel and other dogs.Best dog simulation and pet rescue game ever!If you are having any problems in the game or have a great idea about it please contact gamesupport@frismos.com

comments: Glu games never fail to dissapoint, and Dino Hunter Deadly Shores is no exception. The graphics are satisfying, the weapons are creative and the gameplay is entertaining. I am empathetic, and realize that You need ads to generate income, but the amount of afs in this game is rudiculous Nonetheless, I have had a great experience playing this game, and It never fails to keep me entertained and enthralled. Keep it up!

It is a time killer with some fun for a bit. The graphics are good. My main point of contention is their shady sales practice where they have two GLU credit packs for the same price (say $49.99) one is for 1300 credits and the other for 2500. There is really no difference in the world, except one says credit pack and the other says value pack. It isn't until you get to the payment screen that if you aren't observant that you notice that the "value pack" of 2500 credits for $49.99 is a monthly subscription. They need to clearly state this on the listing so people are well aware before they hit the purchase button. But they won't because they are shady as fu*k

Hi, the game is pretty nice. I have a problem when I select to hunt with a bow for daily missions. Is there a trick to solve this? The problem look like a half of a screen in vertical, has very bad sync with the other half, and is quite impossible to see the monsters; only after I select to zoom, appear for a moment some clear image, but that is not for long...is just impossible to such mission....please fix this.

I've been playing this game since 2016. I know I have had a few different carriers and phones but my stats always begin over. I know you have the means to rollover data therefore for this reason alone l say that you are greedy little men and women.  The game is one of my favorites so there it is. I've spent thousands on this game alone every penny worth it.

I really liked the overall feel of the game, and it isn't too long in loading either. The only thing I don't like is how fast the energy levels wear out. Other than that though it's good, because if you don't have enough money to upgrade to a larger mission, you can do smaller missions to collect more money. :) I would definitely recommend this to gamers.

Great game. Lots of fun to pass the time. I would have given it 5/5 except for the fact that they heavily favor in app purchases and it's about 10 times more difficult to advance without spending real money. But graphics, gameplay, and the concept of the game I give a 10/10!
description: Hunt or be hunted! Embark on the dinosaur hunting expedition of a lifetime to kill the ultimate game in Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores.HUNT DINOSAURSJourney to a hidden, untouched Jurassic island and kill the most ferocious animals in history.  Encounter Jurassic beasts long thought extinct, from the docile stegosaurus to the terrifying T. rex.VISIT EXOTIC Jurassic LOCATIONSKill dinosaurs in lush and dangerous Jurassic environments like the shipwreck-strewn coast, overgrown jungle and dinosaur boneyard!EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONSLoad up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher and shuriken crossbow.  You’ll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill these dinosaurs!MASTER A UNIQUE SHOOTER CHALLENGE SERIESProgress through varied shooter series to win rifles, shotguns and assault rifles. Make your kills and complete them all for even greater rewards!EXPERIENCE AMAZING GRAPHICSDynamic shadows, hi-res textures and realistic Jurassic models all combine to make this one of the most beautiful dinosaur shooter games on your mobile device!High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!“It’s as if Glu Mobile was listening in on my mind as I imagined how good Deer Hunter 2014 would be with dinosaurs.” – Kotaku “… I am totally, absolutely, 100% completely behind blasting dinosaurs with guns until they explode, and happily that's exactly what Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores will let you do.” – AppSpy “Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores dishes up tons of behemoth-shooting action. It’s an easy game to enjoy.” – Gamezebo “Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores is a solid shooter. The dinosaurs in the game are very well detailed and the game allows you to jump right in…” – ModojoPLEASE NOTE:- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. descriptionHTML:
Hunt or be hunted! Embark on the dinosaur hunting expedition of a lifetime to kill the ultimate game in Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores.

HUNT DINOSAURS
Journey to a hidden, untouched Jurassic island and kill the most ferocious animals in history. Encounter Jurassic beasts long thought extinct, from the docile stegosaurus to the terrifying T. rex.

VISIT EXOTIC Jurassic LOCATIONS
Kill dinosaurs in lush and dangerous Jurassic environments like the shipwreck-strewn coast, overgrown jungle and dinosaur boneyard!

EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONS
Load up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher and shuriken crossbow. You’ll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill these dinosaurs!

MASTER A UNIQUE SHOOTER CHALLENGE SERIES
Progress through varied shooter series to win rifles, shotguns and assault rifles. Make your kills and complete them all for even greater rewards!

EXPERIENCE AMAZING GRAPHICS
Dynamic shadows, hi-res textures and realistic Jurassic models all combine to make this one of the most beautiful dinosaur shooter games on your mobile device!

High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!

“It’s as if Glu Mobile was listening in on my mind as I imagined how good Deer Hunter 2014 would be with dinosaurs.” – Kotaku

“… I am totally, absolutely, 100% completely behind blasting dinosaurs with guns until they explode, and happily that's exactly what Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores will let you do.” – AppSpy

“Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores dishes up tons of behemoth-shooting action. It’s an easy game to enjoy.” – Gamezebo

“Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores is a solid shooter. The dinosaurs in the game are very well detailed and the game allows you to jump right in…” – Modojo

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
-This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game’s “Help” feature.

description: Are you ready to run your very own beauty salon? In Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game your kids can design and create their very own hair styles, or take the ultimate challenge and match their customer's hairstyle of choice perfectly! Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game is a fun hairdressing simulation game where everyone can create the most beautiful, fashionable hairstyles at the touch of a button!With two fantastic modes to play, the fun never stops!Key Features:FREE MODEIn Free Mode, your hair models are ready to let you go to town on their hair, all you need is your creativity!Give it a trim, cut it short of leave it long and flowing; the scissors are always at hand.Smooth and straight is nice, but with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can curl to your heart’s content with a selection of different curling tongs each of which makes a tighter or looser curl!Don’t want to curl all of the hair? That’s okay, with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can pick and choose which hair to curl and which to leave straight. Cut the front short into bangs and leave the back long as you like! Accessories make a big impact. Choose from a wide range of beautiful grips, clips, tiaras and cute little animal ears to really make your creations spectacular!Take a picture and share it with all your friends!COPY MODEAre you ready for the ultimate fashion salon challenge? Your customers know exactly what they want and expect you to get it just right!Follow the guide picture and get to work.First you need to wash your customer’s hair – lean them back into the basin and soak their hair with the shower, then lather in that shampoo till there’s plenty of bubbles! Rinse it all off again and add some conditioner to make that hair tangle free.Take a good look at the picture and begin! You’ll be amazed at the kind of hairstyles your customers want, so many different tastes and fashions! But they don’t just want hairstyles, they also want you to do their make-up and for you to pick out the prettiest dress to go with their perfect style makeover!You’ve got to be on top of your game if you’re going to succeed in the hair salon business but don’t worry, if you make any mistakes you can always use the magic redo cream!Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
descriptionHTML:
Are you ready to run your very own beauty salon? In Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game your kids can design and create their very own hair styles, or take the ultimate challenge and match their customer's hairstyle of choice perfectly!

Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game is a fun hairdressing simulation game where everyone can create the most beautiful, fashionable hairstyles at the touch of a button!

With two fantastic modes to play, the fun never stops!

Key Features:

FREE MODE
In Free Mode, your hair models are ready to let you go to town on their hair, all you need is your creativity!

Give it a trim, cut it short of leave it long and flowing; the scissors are always at hand.
Smooth and straight is nice, but with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can curl to your heart’s content with a selection of different curling tongs each of which makes a tighter or looser curl!

Don’t want to curl all of the hair? That’s okay, with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can pick and choose which hair to curl and which to leave straight. Cut the front short into bangs and leave the back long as you like!

Accessories make a big impact. Choose from a wide range of beautiful grips, clips, tiaras and cute little animal ears to really make your creations spectacular!

Take a picture and share it with all your friends!

COPY MODE
Are you ready for the ultimate fashion salon challenge? Your customers know exactly what they want and expect you to get it just right!

Follow the guide picture and get to work.

First you need to wash your customer’s hair – lean them back into the basin and soak their hair with the shower, then lather in that shampoo till there’s plenty of bubbles! Rinse it all off again and add some conditioner to make that hair tangle free.

Take a good look at the picture and begin! You’ll be amazed at the kind of hairstyles your customers want, so many different tastes and fashions! But they don’t just want hairstyles, they also want you to do their make-up and for you to pick out the prettiest dress to go with their perfect style makeover!

You’ve got to be on top of your game if you’re going to succeed in the hair salon business but don’t worry, if you make any mistakes you can always use the magic redo cream!

Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds

comments: This is a great game. Things balance out in terms of time and crafting. You can also earn diamonds fairly easily so you don't need to buy anything. The only issues I have is the market place, everything is gone as soon as you open it, even if you opened it exactly when it refreshes.

It an amazing game just wish it would quite lagging and miss connecting. Would be nice is you could sell some of those free gifts you get or the stuff you buy and don't need like the decorations. All they do is stock up and never get used. Be nice to sell them so you can get more money.

Good game to pass time  . Just too expensive to buy new items and also annoyed by the buy but have to build items. Also i just added friends thru d game n would be glad if theres also a lil' chat box or acknowledging box (wanna thank those game friends since i dnt know them personally 😊) . Looking forward to this game being playable offline (my wish) .

Adorable graphics! Great concept. Missed the bar with execution. Feels like they rush you too much right away with what you have to do and the time needed to do it. Not nearly enough slots open to complete orders properly and smoothly.... I have played too many similar games to know that it shouldn't be this frustrating.  Just some minor tweaks needed. I think if I just ignore my customers completely for a couple levels and give myself some good headway it will be more enjoyable but I'm afraid the problem will still persist... With how really cute the graphics are (complete with adorable cows and deeply chickens)I'm very sad that I may just have to look for a better one.

Very beautiful designed game... But I feel for cooking time should be less... Have to wait a lot... About 20 minutes some..times to prepare dishes ..cannot purchase coins as well...😀overall a wonderful... Super duper addictive unique GAME.. bless the person who made it!

I really love this game and my only problem is with the recent Valentine's quest. I completed 10 tables and out of the ten only received two arrows. This was just in the last hour. Had the same problem yesterday. At this rate I will not be able to get any prizes.

description: Join the shopping craze with 6 beautiful girls of different races! This dress-up app offers about 200 virtual apparel items, hairstyles and accessories to try out. Put together new looks for the dolls: glam, trendy, classy, traditional, fancy, casual or other. These gorgeous women are fabulously rich and don't have to worry about maxing out their credit cards! With their great sense of fashion and style, these fashionistas pick the best places to shop and the most expensive beauty salon to do their hairstyle at.Unlike most other fashionista games out there, there are no in-app purchases, and you can't spend any real money here. It's a truly free dressup game. That's also true for all our other makeover / cosplay apps. Just follow the "More by Games For Girls" link to our new styling games. Train your skills and tastes as an outfit designer. Learn to express yourself and show other people your inner personality and uniqueness with the way you look. If you're more into youth's urban clothing, be sure to check "College Student", "High School". For more glamor stuff, models and celebrities, download "Beauty Queen", "Prom Night" and "Model Wedding".Unleash your inner shopaholic and imagine you are a top super model or a celebrity (famous actress, movie superstar, pop icon, or a reality show star)! Try various outfits and makeovers with each glamour doll.

descriptionHTML:

Features:
* Shop all the ingredients required for the recipe.
* Go to the counter and scan the products.
* Dice all the fresh fruits and combine in the mixer.
* Mix the fruits to make a delicious blended juice
* Pour in gelatine mixture and make a yogurt mix.
* Transfer to popsicle tray and chill until it solidify.

comments: Overall the game is great. Gameplay is smooth but slow (hey, old ships), making the gameplay calming. Graphics are pleasing to the eyes, though it could still need improvements. Sounds are calming too.   You guys should change the image for the gold coins since it resembles a symbol in One Piece. And also the whale movement could be smoother and slower. You could add more creatures in the ocean in addition to the whale since its just blank at times.

Very simple. Gives me a lot of nostalgia. Two things though, it seriously needs music maybe some Celtic tunes or shanties. And secondly it needs more stuff to do. When I first saw a whale I was excited about doing some whaling but nope. The whales do absolutely nothing. Maybe even some treasure hunting puzzles or something. Good game just needs a little more content.

Good game however, once you've taken control of all the islands there is little else to keep you interested. I would look at adding more world's and making the trading a real economy by having the ability to buy items and sell them for a profit in different ports. Potentially even have your ports taken over again or mutiny so you need to recapture them.

It's a really great game! I'm really looking forward to an update. I think it'd be REALLY helpful to be able to purchase an extra boat that just goes around and picks up boxes.. Having to turn around all the time gets tedious. Also an online pvp would be awesome. Maybe have the ability to make clans with your friends that can attack other clans. I'm looking forward to see what you guys do!

This game is great overall and you have a great sense of progression as your ship gets bigger and faster. The problem is the controls themselves. I found it very hard( I noticed this when I reached HP or ship level 6 ) and sometimes close to impossible to fire at other ship even at point blank range. The game has a very hard time trying to focus on one ship and would often shoot at where the enemy was 3 seconds ago especially when there is more than 3 ships at once which often happens. I would recommend a fire button option to compliment the controls and the gameplay experience. As I said before, it is indeed a very amusing game and would be even more enjoyable with this added feature.

Great game in all honesty I can actually see myself playing this game for weeks to months. Everything about it is perfect and I  love how it is not based on a story.   Note devs: for some reason after playing for 10 min strait my boat gets to the point where it can't hit a single shot so I have to restart the game.

description: In this terrifying map for Minecraft you have a unique possibility not only to find yourself in the unusual and creepy world of the popular horror-game, but to play for one of its characters too. If you’re ready to test your nerves, download our new MCPE map for free and imagine yourself a hero of the famous horror-game!In this map for Minecraft you can choose a character, for whom you want to play, and you can a choice of four main heroes: Bendy, Boris, Joe and Henry. As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that’s why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too. All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you’re not scared, and you’re ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn’t made or supported by Mojang. Minecraft and Minecraft Pocket Edition are official trademarks of Mojang AB. The developers of this MCPE map don’t cooperate with Mojang. This application fully adheres to the terms set up by Mojang AB. More info at https://account.mojang.com/terms.

description: Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.The game offers 5 modes :Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)Bonus mode.Game Features:- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.- Free game: play the game for free!- Choose your super heroe. - You can unlock four mine characters.- Incredibly easy operation.Go to adventure!
descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Game Features:
- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.
- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.
- Free game: play the game for free!
- Choose your super heroe.
- You can unlock four mine characters.
- Incredibly easy operation.


Go to adventure!
summary: The main goal - to move forward no matter what. Survive at all costs.
title: Quad Squad

description: It’s JAWS...but with crocodiles!*CHOMP CHOMP CHOMP*	This ravenous crocodile lurks after its frantic prey. With an appetite as big as this beast, you can hunt and snatch up anything. Swim, slither, crawl, and attack! Emerge suddenly from the waters, crawl onto the shore of the beach, and explore around the island looking for your next meal, frightening the unexpecting humans and animals equally. Get them unawares! Control this giant in water and on land. Additionally, change the skin of your crocodile to cool themes including  your country’s flag (if you’re feeling patriotic)!Put your massive jaws to use and cause chaos! Your hunger must be quenched!Crocodile Attack 2016 Features:•Beautifully crafted 3D graphics & realistic water environments: including beaches, docks & open sea•Huge hungry animated 3D crocodile•Smooth and easy controls to make the crocodile swim and attack•Fast action packed gameplay•Girls, Cows, Goats, Chickens and more•Plenty of fun sounds and visual effects**INSTALL NOW AND START CHOMPING!!**About TapinatorTapinator (Ticker: TAPM) develops and publishes games on mobile platforms. The Company’s portfolio includes over 300 mobile gaming titles that, collectively, have achieved over 450 million player downloads. Tapinator is headquartered in New York. For more info, visit Tapinator.com.

comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

comments: Supercalifragisticexpailidocious! This game is not similar to Loop Taxi at all! So if you think that it is, try it please. Give the creators some love and try their game. It's very easy and fun! I garuntee once you try it, you will absolutely love it! And I'm very sorry if it didn't work out for you. Although I'm sure that won't happen to anybody. Thank you creator, creators, or company who created this game. I recommend this game to everyone that lays eyes on it, and please share this game with your friends and family. Best game EVER! 😘😉

Started off with one ticket, then I got another ten, then after a few more spins got another ten tickets, after that I got a few other things like coins and cars, then got more tickets and so on. I got all the cars with the tickets from spinning the wheel and I have so much money now, and I don't know what to do with it, I have already got all the cars. It is a fun game it just needs some improvement that's all. I have around 60000 coins and 70 tickets
Thanks for the auto reply, idiots! Big coins don't count towards total? Bought a double coin car and the large coins which I believe are supposed to be worth 10 don't add coins at all.

Fun game, annoying ads I was having fun with the game but the ads are intrusive to the point of frustration. I uninstalled it after the fourth noisy video ad popped up in about 5 minutes of play. The only option to remove ads is to buy a car that costs over $20. If there were an option to pay$1 - $5 to remove ads, or if the ads weren't so loud while I have the game on silent, I would have been happy. Fun, simple game, but if I have the game sounds off, the ads should be silent too.

Repetitive and lots of ads. The idea is good. The graphics look nice. But a full 20 second advertisement video after EVERY round.. That got annoying pretty quick! Also there is not much variation.. You just go in circles.. and go.. and go.. and..

No Challenge after unlocking everything Bug bug bug...big coins which come up as game progresses don't add to the total coin collection... Also the last car which u unlock which has double life & double coins feature has issue of scoring.. the total score does not pass "3" even though in actual u hav completed more than 3 rounds
description: The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car. Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle.Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.Survive as long as possible, as you train your reactions, climb leaderboard with higher scores and challenge your friends.Hurry up and join the impossible race now!
descriptionHTML:
The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!
New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!

As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.
Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car.
Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle.
Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.
Survive as long as possible, as you train your reactions, climb leaderboard with higher scores and challenge your friends.
Hurry up and join the impossible race now!
developerAddress: RAK FREE TRADE ZONE BLDG PO 10055
summary: Race in circles at full speed, keep your eyes on other cars and do not crash!
title: Loop Drive 2

comments: Game is awesome! Butt! It would be better if I could replay my amazing shots lol.  And a better aimer that's not so close to the edge of the screen would be nice. Still a pretty awesome game though,  in my opinion. Probably ridiculously hard for some of you who aren't as good as me but we can't all be pro lmao

Its a great game but the ads on the top of the screen during gameplay aren't cool. It messes with my shots. If you get rid of that I'll give a 5 ☆ rating. I understand that when a game is free the company needs to add ads to make money, but during gameplay on the screen is a little extensive. I don't usually give anything less than five stars,  I'm genuinely sorry. A quick reply would be much appreciated, thanks for your time.

Ruined by ads Well.. I quite liked the game until I finished the first level.. then ads... ads... and more bloody ads... do not get this if you like your game play to be fluid!!!!!  If you like to play a game for 10 seconds then watch 30 seconds of ads every level.. then this game is for you.. I have now uninstalled it.. if I could give minus stars then I would

The same ad ran, after every other level, just too much. I would never dl the advertised game due to it being shoved at me repeatedly. Not much in creativity, a lot of the same scenes just a move of the cup or an added piece. Uninstalled before I get further annoyed.

Fun game, but advertisements are WAAAAAY too frequent to actually enjoy the game (practically every 3rd round). Install if you'd like or don't mind ads all the time, but I didn't make it before deciding to uninstall. Game is absolutely in no way new or ground breaking so you'd be better off with any of the other similar games with far fewer forced ads.

I said if one more add comes up, I'm deleting this game. There is literally a 1 minute add after every single level. This game sucks so bad. I kept my word and uninstalled it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. It's not worth it at all.

comments: Graphics are decent. Controls are good. However,  you can earn 10x more $ for a 5 lap race than a 400 lap race. Many times you will be in 1st or 2nd and as the last lap winds down you lose several positions even though nobody passes you.  Oh and the "coming soon" section, don't expect to ever see anything else show up there. Overall, it's a fun game to pass the time,  but these bugs have been reported for at least 2 years and never been fixed.

I love  this   game Still loving the game. Just wanted to put this out there. It would be cool if you could make it to were you could put different designs on the cars like pant the middle the front and rear different colors kinda like the Nascar games. Just wanted to put that out there. But I there way the game still rocks. An for the ppl that thinks it sucks they must not like racing because I've looked at all the round track games and this one is the best of all. Ur biggest fan.

Needs lots of improvement......... 1. Improve graphics quality like extreme car racing . It will improve the game.  2. Increase the number of opponents in the race.  3. Seriously I don't believe that you added 400 laps race , I think it will be better to race rookies cup which give you 1000 dollar games in just 5 lap.     And you are providing 3000 game dollar for 400 laps . I think you should decrease the 400 laps to 100 or 60 laps it will be a better choice. 4. You have added pit lane in the game so provide a pit stop in the game also .

If possible need there needs to be another look at the position of your car during the race. Ice noticed mulitple times that once i get to first place, i win in first but when i go ro collect thw reward cash it always says seventh or eighth place.. its really irking.  Please fix. Otherwise i do enjoy the game

Great Game but can they add something! Add in cautions, working pit Stalls with tire ware and fuel usage, and tire air pressure adjustment settings so we do get as loose as we do. If you do I will make a YouTube Series about the game and keep this good review!

This game has definitely improved since I'd last played it but, there is still some room for improvement. Controls are one thing. This has always been a problem. More controls need to be added, like the steering wheel. Also, real tracks and events. I'm not sure can you actually do this but if you can, please add this and also, graphics. If you could put in some better shaders and if you could improve upon the car models. This game is okay. I rate this 6/10.
description: Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!RACE MODES :Multiplayer - Race head to head against other playersRegulation  - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizesLadder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game CenterPractice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trimCARS:Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!EXPERIENCE THE SPEEDFeel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money. ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACINGBeat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.MULTIPLE TRACKS4 unique tracks to unlock.REAL CRASH PHYSICSPersistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCARDesign your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAREngine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.SETUP YOUR STOCK CARAllows you to adjust your car for race trim.REAL SIMULATIONVisually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.RUBBER-BANDING ASSISTHelps gets you back into the race quicker.EARN IN-GAME CASHBased on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.Drivers start your engines!
descriptionHTML:
Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!

Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!

RACE MODES :
Multiplayer - Race head to head against other players
Regulation - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizes
Ladder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.
Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.
Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game Center
Practice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trim

CARS:
Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACING
Beat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.

MULTIPLE TRACKS
4 unique tracks to unlock.

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Persistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
Allows you to adjust your car for race trim.

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.

RUBBER-BANDING ASSIST
Helps gets you back into the race quicker.

EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.

Drivers start your engines!

comments: Game started off fine, and it's challenging. I seem to be finding that the higher up in levels you get the more issues there are. Game keeps crashing and restarting, I have a lot of times I don't get my whole free time awarded to me. I am seriously considering uninstalling this game because these issues are taking the fun out of it.

Terrible freezing,  while playing. In losing lives and boosters.  YOU NEED TO FIX THIS,  IF YOU'RE GOING TO WANT GAMERS TO SPEND MONEY... Update.. Almost a year later, its STILL CRASHING.. Quick question developer... "Do you ever give this app and comments any attention!!??!?!?!"..

This game makes it too apparent that they want you to spend money with them. Games are more fun when you get so caught up in them that spending money on them is just an afterthought. This game is designed to stop you from winning in to many different ways. The birds that are supposed to help you only screw up your strategy most of the time, and I have seen bubbles just reappear. Not joking, literally watched them just appear out of nowhere. I have seen too many ways in which a win can be taken away from you. So, it feels a little unfair and forced. I understand it is business, but it seems to be designed to be a little to greedy for my taste.
My only complaint, the stupid 5 lives thing.  Later in the game when it's tough I end up having to stop playing because I'm out of life.
Gets boring after a while because some of the levels are so hard! It appears that they want you to go broke on boosters! Otherwise, it is fun!

It would be 5 stars but the game pauses and freezes a lot.  When it freezes it takes away a  life, any boosts bought and won't send you to the next level even if you win. It also takes forever to load. Even after installing Google Play Games, it still freezes and takes forever load. pleeeease fix these glitches, I don't want to have to start playing Toy Blast 😐

descriptionHTML:
Blast into a new Angry Birds puzzle adventure game! The birds are trapped inside balloons, and you can bet the pigs are behind it all. Tap matching balloons to blast them to smithereens and free the flock!

Use your balloon-bustin’ skillz to outsmart the pigs and save birds in over 600 egg-celent levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Grab rewards every day in the Daily Quest. Already got ’em? Then go join the weekly events or chase down this month's puzzle pieces. Blasted through those? How about taking on the world in the global leaderboard?

There’s plenty to do, and an ever-growing number of levels to master so get BLASTING!
