description: Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
descriptionHTML:
Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.

* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.

* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.

* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.

* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.

* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.

* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.

* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.

* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.

* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
summary: Simple turn based strategy game with a unique mix of tactics and luck.
title: Board Battlefield

description: Hey Friends, Are you want to become a body piercer? If yes then show your skills in this Princess Piercing Artist Salon game and run your own virtual piercing shop. Here in this Piercing Artist Salon game, The beautiful princess need of a nose piercing, Tummy Piercing, Eyebrow Piercing, Ear Piercing and she select your Piercing salon to help pierce her nose, eyebrows, ear and tummy. Start by spa treatment for a smooth skin. Select your favourite body part where to place the piercing and use the piercing gun to place the jewelry. comments: Good game, slightly annoying at times to control movement of the characters, tend to become awkward when trying to stay in straight line. Other than that is a good game to pass the time!

This game is not good. All you do is drive to a circle so an animation takes over while the avatar rescues a cat from a tree. Or you pull in to a circle and tap the screen a couple times to close a valve. You move from circle to circle being stuck in one spot at each one. There is very limited movement during tasks. And then on top of it you do all kinds of non-firefighter tasks. Clearing logs from a street? Really? That's a public works job. Closing a water valve? That's utilities. Rescuing a cat? Come on. That's animal control. Firefighters don't actually rescue cats from trees. And the missions are short. Pretty sure I finished the game in 20 minutes.

I can not get this game to work. It says 'Your hardware does not support this application'. This has happened with a few other fireman games. I have a new Sony XZ Premium phone so I don't understand why it won't work. Can anyone tell me if I can resolve this problem?

description: Want to serve humanity? Like rescue, action, driving and parking games? NY City Firefighter 2017 awaits!On a bright sunny day in New York City, you encounter a building in flames! You are a courageous firefighter, and your duty is to rescue your fellow New Yorkers. Are you up for the challenge?! Grab your hose and slap on your combat boots; fires don’t wait for anybody. NY City FireFighter includes brigade truck driving, parking, and action play. Race through city roads with your team in a quick fashion. Evade traffic and keep pedestrians safe. Use your parking skills to avoid clashing with city vehicles. Next, embark on several rescue missions in different locations. There will be shopping malls, banks, schools, office buildings, and even hospitals to rescue! Drive your fire truck to a HOT location and COOL it down! Locate fire points using your radar to rescue within given time and get maximum mission completion points. As you progress within the game, levels will become more interesting and challenging!NY City FireFighter 2017 Features:•Amazing visual and Cool sounds effects•Super thrilling Firefighter Missions to complete•Numbers of Firefighters Trucks and ambulances•New York City Environment with Cool 3D Graphics•Numbers of Animated People to Rescue•Smooth, Easy & Addictive GameplayAbout Tap2Play:Tap2Play, LLC is a wholly owned subsidiary of Tapinator, Inc.Tapinator Inc. (Ticker: TAPM) develops and publishes games on mobile platforms. The Company’s portfolio includes over 250 mobile gaming titles that, collectively, have achieved over 350 million player downloads. Tapinator is headquartered in New York. For more info, visit Tapinator.com.

comments: This is an excellent little arcade game with simple but challenging controls. I like the variety of different weapons you get to choose from and the graphics are lovely and evoke a kind of 'dawn of time' feel. The only criticism would be that earning ivory (the in game currency) is slow and there are no other options to obtain apart from buying some.

enjoy this game, welldone!!   Suggestion: can bring 2 or 3 weapons and swap in battle.    Hint for newbie, tripple bow is the key.   Dont waste money on entry level of each weapon, always save for the strongest. 1st start with tripple spear. The poison blowgun is good for earning money in training but very for later game level 80+  Get 25k is pretty easy to earn in daily rewards and training. I can get it in a few hours quickly, each training 4-10k point.

One of the best challenging game I've played so far. In the beginning it seems a very tough game (specially the terror bird story) but eventually you'll fall in track. One thing I would like to suggest that in gameplay, if there is an option to change the weapon (maybe in between 2 alternatives), then it would be more interesting. Thanks.

- if you are playing the game there is no option to get out of the app or to go to the main menu or restart the play.  - bug: even if the player is dead the game does not terminates this Happens for 5 times in 100 that is not a good show. - I loved played the app but I think you should test the app for the bugs and some missing functional points  - over all I will rate app 4 star & good

Its great and addicting and has very little ads. The only thing I don't like is that the amount of levels needed to move on in the game and the prices if weapons are a bit too much. I would give it like a 4.8/5

The art work, the atmosphere, the weapon choices. It's perfect. I couldn't be more happier that i found this game. The only thing I would personally change is the Tribe Leader's cheering sound. It's a bit silly and is the only thing that truly breaks the immersion of this game for me.

A good concept that needs some work.   The good.   The puzzles gradually ramp up the difficulty.   The visuals and sound are very good for the app.   Some requests   An ad free one time paid version would be nice  The game needs some tool tips. Like if you click on a object in the game. It should tell you some stats. Like power capacity and power requirements.   How about an in game Twitter and or email contact link.   Can power lines please be able to spit off into 2 different directions  The only bad  Too many ads and the ads are too long 30+ seconds.

Lovely little game. Starts out easy showing you the controls/events, but quickly ramps up the puzzle. Speech bubbles get in the way of putting lines down and cause you to lose because you only had 30s to complete the level. Adding an option for a topdown view would solve this because then you could actually see all the directions instead of only 2-3 at a time. Oh and the ads suck. Can we buy a version without them?

What the game is this....everything in the game matters...the no of poles which decides the resistance...the current flow in it indicating potential difference...3 lines conduct more than 2 and single lines...the hurricanes and disconnections indicate open circuit.... I'm an electrical student...finally finished the game...this game is fantastic...just need one more such game from STATNETT...thank you for this game....the other app ohm is also good...plzz develop one more such game!!!!!!!! THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

Creating lines maneuvering needs improvement. It's hard, I have to zoom in just to get it right. But over all, it's a nice game. Now, I get to understand the complexity. Often times, we in our area simply complain about brownouts without knowing the critical planning and action being done in the background. Kudos!
Opened to just a black screen that played music. Absolutely no indication that anything was happening. My screen might as well have been locked, except I could still swipe in the notification bar
description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

description: Car drive parking is a simulation game and the master piece of kooker studio. You can see many games in the play store for example simulation racing parking shooting constructions and many more. The concept of all these games become dull and boring. Repetition of similar games make it boring. You will really experience a challenging game environment in this car drive parking. After playing this car driving games you can increase your parking skills in the car parking backyard. You will become expert car driver. Get an amazing experience of car drive parking and drift along the car drive simulation 3D. Show all your driving drifting and racing skills as a legend and real expert driver in this car drive parking. While driving you will have to face many difficult challenges which make the game more interesting. In the car drive parking, all the cars that are selected very luxury and latest. In the car drive parking, you can park your own vehicles at your home and park. You have played many car parking free game but the car drive parking is more interesting rather than the other car parking simulator 3D games. There are three unique play style first steering second is tilt your android device and the third is swipe a slider. After a long drive, we have to park our car bus or other vehicles so you can fulfill your desire that how you can park in the busy parking mania. Car drive parking game is a car parking level game. You can park your car parking in the hill areas and city parking. Car drive parking 20 different cars stunning graphics and addictive gameplay. You can test your drive on city streets rural areas speedways as well as parking lots. You will be able to know that how you can park your car on the traffic parking jam. Developers add many types of levels that’s why we can say it car parking level game or you can say it car parking multi level. First of you have to put your seat belt than press the accelerator button and your car move forward. Be careful that your car don’t hit to another car if you did so than your game level failed. Proper complete the level gives you some bonus coins which help you to unlock new levels and cars. After the five levels you will be able to unlock the jeep and prado for parking mania. A new version is added in this game that its back camera  majority cars game have back camera but this car drive park has latest camera while driving you can rotate the direction of the camera as you like. Game Features.30 interesting levelsLatest and luxury carsVery attractive and hd graphicsIncrease acceleration on touching the screen

description: Welcome to our Makeup Salon! Is your dream to become a makeup artist? Now is your chance to test your skills by making countless of makeup combinations, from party makeup to prom or even a bridal one. Apply eye shades, eyelashes, glowing blushes, face paintings, glamorous lipsticks and diamond stones. Your imagination is the limit! You can make something magical, or something glamorous worthy of a superstar, or a fabulous look for a fashion show, or just a delicate wedding makeup. Be as creative as you want and create unique makeup designs for our beautiful models here. Make sure you’ll choose a complementary hairstyle and gorgeous accessories to complete the look you’ve created!

description: If you are looking for REAL mobile rally simulation, than you are in the right place. Race at 60 fps in mud, snow, dirt and asphalt in this fast-paced racing game.AMAZING ACTION!Prove yourself fast in daytime and nighttime tracks, dare to speed in hostile conditions and terrain, drift along the turns and pay attention to your co-driver's pacenotes (Or he will get mad, we can assure it!).DRIVE ON REAL-WORLD TRACKS!Drive on awesome tracks: they are all modeled around existing and famous rally tracks, feel every little road's roughness, run on the edge of a pitfall, feel the breeze of the Alps' snow and the heat of the Mexico sun!AMAZING CARS!Customize the driver's name and the name of your co-pilot together with their country flags and stick them on your car's window! Get your livery dirty while trying to nail that turn, chose among a lot of different cars, each with its handling and performance!TAKE THE LEAD!Chose among two different championships: J-SPEC for beginners and S-SPEC for legendary drivers! Will you get to top??CHALLENGE THE WORLD!Smash the leaderboards and show the world you are the fastest rally driver around... or show to them right on track: with multiplayer mode you can challenge a friend or players from all over the world!Get M.U.D. Rally now, join the Rally!
descriptionHTML:
If you are looking for REAL mobile rally simulation, than you are in the right place. Race at 60 fps in mud, snow, dirt and asphalt in this fast-paced racing game.

AMAZING ACTION!
Prove yourself fast in daytime and nighttime tracks, dare to speed in hostile conditions and terrain, drift along the turns and pay attention to your co-driver's pacenotes (Or he will get mad, we can assure it!).

DRIVE ON REAL-WORLD TRACKS!
Drive on awesome tracks: they are all modeled around existing and famous rally tracks, feel every little road's roughness, run on the edge of a pitfall, feel the breeze of the Alps' snow and the heat of the Mexico sun!

AMAZING CARS!
Customize the driver's name and the name of your co-pilot together with their country flags and stick them on your car's window! Get your livery dirty while trying to nail that turn, chose among a lot of different cars, each with its handling and performance!

TAKE THE LEAD!
Chose among two different championships: J-SPEC for beginners and S-SPEC for legendary drivers! Will you get to top??

CHALLENGE THE WORLD!
Smash the leaderboards and show the world you are the fastest rally driver around... or show to them right on track: with multiplayer mode you can challenge a friend or players from all over the world!

Get M.U.D. Rally now, join the Rally!
developerAddress: via l.da vinci 13, Polistena, 89024 RC, Italy
recentChanges: -Rate us 5 stars if you like the game!
summary: Get in your rally car, start your engine and race!
title: M.U.D. Rally Racing

Coco play games used to be really good with barely no ads like Ava the 3d doll. Now, look what happened. This game has stacks of ads that has NO X BUTTON causing me to press ◀ every time they show up.

This is a fun and interesting game and it has good illustrations but I have two suggestions. First, save the outfits and makeup when you exit the game because it gets annoying to redo it every time I open the app. Second, make the races longer and more complicated.

If this was fixed then I would give this app 5 stars. But this always bothers me to get rid of my pony's outfit. This is a fun game overall.

descriptionHTML:
It is high time for you to start mining of bitcoins. Get the bitcoins with your own farm. Buy improvements and develop your empire.
They filled the whole house with bitcoins, make all the free space farms, let them get even more bitcoins. In fact bitcoin does not happen much. Sell ​​the cue ball on the stock exchange, along with altcoin and etherium. The constant change in the exchange of currencies, the dynamic rate of bitcoin, the rise in prices, prices are constantly changing. If you like the price, press to sell and get your dollars.
For those who do not know what bitcoin or mining is. Mining is prey. Bitcoin is a crypto currency, a currency very popular on the Internet. There are also alternative crypto-currencies, such as ether, or etherium, altcoin, Ripple - the fastest crypto currency, lightcoin and others.
The game has a huge number of locations that you can fill up with your farms and assim. Asik is a special installation for the crypto currency.
Build your business on a crypto currency, this will ensure you a good payroll in the game, and you can buy a gold installation in your apartment.
Compete with all the ministers of our planet and become the best! Become a Bitcoin Tycoon!

- Added a new location "Ship" Now you can go on a trip to the Ice Cave by the sea, and mine the bitcoins right on the deck on the way.

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

The game is kind of fun and the controls are good but it would be better if it was an open world game and you had more freedom to walk around and things to do on your own instead of just following the directions and the goals. Other than that the game is pretty fun but does get boring after awhile since it's not an open world

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Bad controls make it very frustrating. There's just not much going on but walking around with extreme difficulty due to controls. Also the neighbors houses are tiny if you walk up to one the front door only goes to your waist.
Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics
Too many ads! Every time I go to the next level I have to wait for ages and by the time its loaded I am bored! Maybe make the levels last longer? Other than that its OK!
description: This game is a variant of Virtual DAD, and just as fun! Virtual In the midst of a hectic urban neighborhood, Mom is up and ready to take on the day. You’re the boss here. Take care of tough tasks like managing all the household activities at once! Get all your daily tasks done in time to progress to the next day! If you fall behind, your family will, too! This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids’ breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more! Step into the shoes of a mom’s daily life. This game plays on the element of surprise. Expect the unexpected, as surprise events will pop up during your routine, and make your day much more difficult! The completion of every level increases the variety and difficulty of tasks.The life of a mom is demanding. Don’t let your family down! Be a SUPERMOM for your family!Virtual Mom Happy Family 3D Features:• High Quality 3D Graphics• Awesome Sounds for Maximum Fun! • Smooth and Easy Controls• Addictive Game Play• Super Cool House Environment• Family Woman Life Simulation• Daily Household Tasks Based Missions to Complete

comments: I really love playing skipbo but now the ads are getting to be outrageous. Not only are the ads after every turn you make but now they freeze constantly and I have to shut down and restart it. I would buy the 2$ but that still has ads too; so what's even the point... so dissapointed.

I get that ads should be used to support a free app.. But this game is unplayable due to every ad they insert. Literally after every action is another 30 sec ad. You can't even play the main game because they kill you with ads. Uninstalling.

I really enjoy this game but there are too many ads and it crashes every now and then. Online play is kind of bad because it pairs you with ppl that dont ever play and if they do its every couple days until you can play your turn, which could be just to discard a card. I do absolutely like this game. I play actual card game still to this day. Great app just needs work. Will update more stars after updates start coming out.

Would be nice if the game would stop glitching and making me lose coins. Edit: I was excited about the update but there's still glitches!! You pay a coin to use the extra card in your hand boost and the robots get to have 5 cards but you only get 2 or 3 or if you're lucky you'll get 4 cards in total in your hand.

I love the game, the set up is great but if you want more people to actually play the you get rid of some of the ads. I completely understand that the ads are a key point but not it is annoying while your in a middle of a game and an ad pop up. Sorry but it makes me not want to play. I have never wrote a comment or rated a game for the simple fact that if I didn't like it I would just delete the app or game but I took my time to write this one because I really love this game and it brings back lots of childhood memories and I don't have to actually sit down and play with others

So many ads they interfere with gameplay! What should be a quick turn becomes a 3 minute play. I don't ads, I support developers making money and even click on ads for bonuses, but this is ridiculous. The game is also laggy, which I suspect if from the ads trying to load. Expect game crashes as well - one occurs every gameplay for me.

Feel the intensity!- Join the S.W.A.T. team and kill all the zombies. You must protect Perfectville, the last remaining safe zone.- Shoot all the guns at an endless zombie horde! Use bombs too!- A new defense game that offers FPS sniper mechanics with strong addictive authentic defense elements! Go and immerse yourself in this fun game!■ Game Features ■- Collect Weapons: Collect around 50 different types of weapons. descriptionHTML:
- The defense game with over 11 million downloads is back with more advanced graphics and systems!
- Kill or be killed! It’s one or the other! It's the breathtaking confrontation for mankind's survival!
- Stay frosty! The tension never lets up as you move to the second half of the stage! Feel the intensity!
- Join the S.W.A.T. team and kill all the zombies. You must protect Perfectville, the last remaining safe zone.
- Shoot all the guns at an endless zombie horde! Use bombs too!

■ Game Features ■

- Bizarre Zombies: Skateboarding, bowling, spear-wielding, fat, pink-wearing, and even dog zombies! Face all kinds of zombies!

- Challenge Hell Mode! Hell Mode Stages stimulate the desire to fight, but will be tough without upgrades! If you have the skills and confidence, try it!

comments: Ads and no energy It's fun as long as you get to play it. Unfortunately you run out of energy quickly. Which means you have to wait to continue, which gets really boring after some time. Of course ads help the devs earn some money but the amount of ads here is really annoying :(

Had to uninstall because of noisy ads I reallly enjoyed the game, some tricky questions but if I can't play it anywhere (for example in public places) because I always have to be scared of loud music blasting after each level... Too bad!

This game has way too many "facts" that are straight up WRONG. Sometimes it's just the phrasing, other times the whole thing. This game is helping the population grow more misinformed because they will think the devs did their research. By level 21 I had encountered 4-5 "facts" (which is too high a frequency in my honest opinion) that I could not only prove wrong with my own knowledge, but also with a really quick Google search, so I implore you devs give players an option to report wrong "facts" so you can review them, or just review all of them if you do not want to do that, and just fact-check them.

description: If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!  Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around. • Play to discover all these wintertime features: • Skin-tones and blushes • Eye-lenses and eyebrows • Fabulous mascaras • Tons of glamorous eyeshadows• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors• Wintry face-paints• Icy tops• Necklaces and earrings• Beautiful hairstyles  • Wonderful tiaras So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras
• Tons of glamorous eyeshadows
• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors
• Wintry face-paints
• Icy tops
• Necklaces and earrings
• Beautiful hairstyles
• Wonderful tiaras

So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!

description: Building & crafting… and fishing! Start Exploration of a blocky seas! Get the biggest catch! Become a fishing champion of square world! Fishing games! Craft new rods and gear! Let’s fish now! Craft the best fishing hook using materials found in sandbox blocky world, drive a car (jeep 4x4), explore and discover new fishing areas! Open world games! It’s an extreme sport fishing game simulator in a world build with blocks! Avoid the crocodile attack or angry shark while casting a fishing rod!   for sport fishing enthusiasts! Love building, constructing and have a hobby called fishing? Then start the game! Catch the best fish (marlin, shark, goldfish, catfish, salmon etc.) or an old shoe or… a mermaid! Looking for free crafting and  fishing games (bass fishing, ice fishing, fly fishing, sport fishing, big fish fishing and more) or best outdoor games? Great! Fishing craft offers the best summer fishing and winter fishing experience, so u don't have to search for any other hobby games anymore. Miner & fisherman! Dig, build and catch!  Building & crafting games with fishing mod! Build a city using blocks, start Exploration of blocky world searching for best fishing spot! Try to get the biggest catch! Sport fishing game! Design and decorate your fisherman’s house (design craft). Collect the trophies and explore the world! Creative game for people with hobby! Start the fishing adventure! Sandbox open world full of fishes to catch! Use boats or yachts to catch the rarest species. Some fish are really rare and need special unique equipment to catch!  Pocket edition pixel hero game! It’s a boys and girls craft! Sim game for real fishing fans! See what happens when the cat goes fishing! Experience the thrill of catching a variety of freshwater  & saltwater fish. Improve your skills by finding the right combination of tackle, retrieval motion, and lake locations to catch bigger fish each outing. Great game for parents and adults as well! Wild catch & square fish!  Become a master angler! Let’s fish in a square world! Craft, build and explore. Creative game for teenage boys and girls! Start ridiculous fishing now! description: You have to play the character Stickman, who was put in jail. Your task is to find two successful ways of escape with the use of crafting. Kraft should be at every step, so as not to become a victim of guards and dangerous creatures.In the prison chamber of, you will have a box of chest, which will contain the necessary ingredients for crafting. Use different blocks, weapons and wit to make a successful escape from prison.Among the monsters you will see zombies, spiders, dragons, wild horses and many other characters and monsters. Also you will see different weapons, among them there will be a sword, a pickaxe, dynamite and more.The game will encounter various switches, and portals, with which you can travel. descriptionHTML:

descriptionHTML:
Spielspaß und Herausforderung in einer App: Das neue kostenfreie Aufbauspiel „Mei Lidl Markt“ für Groß und Klein!

Du hast Lust, deinen eigenen Supermarkt zu planen, diesen immer weiter zu vergrößern und Waren wie frisches Obst & Gemüse, Getränke, Blumen und vieles mehr an deine Kunden zu verkaufen?

Dann bietet die Mei Lidl Markt App genau die richtige Herausforderung für dich!

Deine Aufgaben:
- Sammle Boni-Waren, um deine Filiale zu vergrößern
- Löse verschiedene Tagesaufgaben, z.B. leere 50 Mal die Kasse, um weitere Münzen zu bekommen
- Erspiele dir Trophäen, indem du z.B. eine Kundenzufriedenheit von mehr als 80% erreichst
- Meistere spontane Herausforderungen, indem du z.B. ein Rudel Möpse aus dem Markt vertreibst
- Sorge für die Zufriedenheit deiner Kunden, denn ihnen ist es wichtig, dass du frische und vielfältige Produkte in einer sauberen Filiale verkaufst

Features:
- Spannendes Aufbauspiel in farbenfroher Lidl-Welt mit herausfordernden Aufgaben
- Verschiedene Spielfiguren (Verkäufer, Kunden usw.), Waren und Verkaufsräume
- Strichcode-Detektiv: Scanne echte Lidl-Produkte für Lidl-Münzen, mit denen du den Boni- Automaten nutzen kannst.
- Boni-Automat: mit den hier erspielten Boni-Waren kannst du deine Filiale erweitern
- Statistik: Hier erhältst du jederzeit Einblick in Kundenanzahl und -zufriedenheit sowie deine Top-Produkte

Gut zu wissen:
- Die Updates zur App liefern regelmäßige neue Aufgaben und Erweiterungsmöglichkeiten
- Zielgruppe: Ab 6 Jahre
- Kindersicher: Keine In-App- Käufe, keine Werbung, keine Weiterleitung zu externen Links

Lidl Österreich wünscht viel Spaß beim Aufbau deines eigenen Supermarkts!
developer: Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
developerAddress:
Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
Stiftsbergstraße 1
74172 Neckarsulm
recentChanges: - Neue Filialstufe: Der erweiterte Supermarkt bietet dir viel Platz für neue Regale.
- Erweitertes Sortiment: Viele frische, neue Waren locken neue Kundengruppen an.
- Mitarbeiter-Upgrade: Du brauchst Unterstützung? Dann kannst du ab sofort neue Mitarbeiter einstellen.
- Mehr Abwechslung: Die Quests wurden erweitert.
summary: The new free building game "Mei Lidl market" for young and old!
title: Mei Lidl Markt

comments: This game is very interesting. The battles you have against others is good, but I wish the Characters had more verity in they're animations. Also the money you get once you win is too low. Leveling up only takes 2-3 fights. Getting gear to make them stronger takes 3-6 games.   Also; if this game gets an update I want the characters to have voiced lines depending on if they win or lose. As easy as it is to see the negatives there are some positives: game play is smooth and plays just like you want it to.  If it wasn't for the bad rewards I would say this is one of the best games Facebook

HEAR ME OUT KILOO... This game is fun and all but not all people (like myself) cant afford data and stick to wifi often. And that sucks because this is such a great game. And the fact that you cant play it on the go ruins the fun. So please... PLEASE... have an offine mode for this game.

Good graphics, nice gameplay, ok-ish controls. Why I only say "ok-ish" ? Because sometimes at the training they are a bit choppy. But however this game is brilliant and even if you only play at the training at all the game is pretty entertaining, good job !

description: Sleep all day, PARTY ALL NIGHT! Enjoy holidays break on summer high school vacation camp in a paradise! Bay watch won’t stop you from being a beach party king at the hottest beach on Earth! Music, dancing, crafting & building!Time for a summer high school adventure!Imagine a paradise island: warm nights, hot beaches, cute girls and handsome boys… It’s all here in Beach Party Craft! Experience an unique mix of crafting & building games with fashion games, music games and dancing games! Start your high school music adventure with crafting & building your own world (from blueprints!) or look for fun in the paradise island of Beach Party Craft! Sea adventure begins!Are you ready for the hottest beach party on Earth?Beach Party Craft isn’t only about crafting & building. It’s one of the best party games, but before you go wild like a party animal, make some preparations! Go shopping and change your clothes - it’s not a fashion runway, but not a pool party too! Dress up, add some makeup, visit nail salon and spa, look for famous hair salon of Coco. Games for girls are usually plain simple, but Beach Party Craft isn’t! If you want to amuse your best high school friends, boyfriend or girlfriend, you MUST dress up like a star. Dancing queen or king is going to be yours!Enjoy the nightlifeIn Beach Party Craft you will find other party fun fans! Meet with friends from high school or last dorm party, then chat with your high school crush! But don’t waste your time on some high school romance like in many casual games for girls. Instead, look for single boys and girls - craft your own love story. Find a hip hop dancing queen like Elsa or a disco girl of your dreams like Nikki. Have fun in the theme park and become the best friends or maybe even a girlfriend and boyfriend!Sea adventure awaitsTired of beach party? Build yourself a fishing boat or… a glamorous yacht! Crafting & building games meet music games and dancing games in one of the best of casual games for girls of 2017! This vacation you just can’t miss this summer camp. Also make sure to keep an eye on the running time, and avoid colliding with hurdles. You will earn extra rewards by completing each level. description: Dinosaur World Craft Exploration:Lite - an exciting game in prehistoric cubic universe where you build, construct, create & craft - using blocks - in world! Dinosaurs (t-rex [tyrannosaurus], triceratops etc.] all around you! This lite pocket mine blocky craft game, inspired by the popular cube & voxel based pocket edition creative games, lets you craft dino world! No dragons and no survival - just prehistoric reptiles! Teenage boys and girls are welcome! Craft & build a perfect cube dinosaurs world! Exploration of world is here! Construct anything you want! Play in a creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the cube dino world.Craft, and explore! Exploration of randomly generated cube prehistoric worlds, islands. Build and create amazing & perfect things from the simplest of homes to the grandest constructions! Start the adventure with “Dino Jurassic Craft Exploration”! This game will bring you only joy and relax! No dragons and survival world craft mode. Just cube jurassic craft world/island and your infinite creativity! Very quick and easy. All for free! This pocket edition (exploration) game contains: block placing, cube world, real time world craft generation. Build a dinosaur world!Craft & Explore the cube world! In this incredible and totally free game you can destroy all the blocks, collect resources, survive and build beautiful & perfect Buildings. This  pocket edition game (PE) contains a large number of different blocks with which you can craft your own cube world/Island! High resolution textures, very convenient and thoughtful game control, High FPS, without compromise! So plunge into the fantastic world of ‘Dino Jurassic Craft: Exploration & Evolution’ - with new cube worlds and adventures! Place blocks / cubes move voxels, dig and mine! Go beyond your wildest dreams, make your own cube jurassic world, mine, castle or city! Great game for adults! And teens! Transform the surface in a 3D environment in Jurassic Jungle! Build shelter, fight, grow and use blocky craft. The only limit is your imagination! Start a cube world craft! description: Have you ever wanted to own and look after your own horse? Well now you can with the horse grooming salon game! Here you will be able to easily choose your own horse and do all the things that need to be done when owning and looking after your horse. Here you can clean out her stall, swat all the annoying flies, as well as wash, dry and brush her to make her look pretty. You can also change her horse shoes and remove any dirt, while also feeding her, watering her, rubbing her down and giving her vaccinations. Once done you can easily accessorize by using a bridle, saddle, and headpiece to prepare her for her day out riding with this fun horse grooming game. Game Features: - CHOOSE your very own horse to look after- CLEAN up all the poo with the broom- SWAT all the flies before they bite your horse and cause sores- WASH, rinse, dry and brush your horse ready for her grooming session- CLEAN her teeth to give her a beautiful smile. - CHANGE her horse shoes so she can ride without pain or discomfort- CLIP her hair to make it look nice and straight for her big debut- VACCINATE your horse so she can be around other horses- FEED and water your horse so she is ready for riding- RUB all her good spots to show her you love her- ACCESSORIZE with a saddle, head piece and bridle** version 3.0.0 LATEST UPDATE- play levels you want with our contextual level menu, button is located on the top right corner- earn coins to unlock new horses- added new horses- faster game play
descriptionHTML:
Have you ever wanted to own and look after your own horse? Well now you can with the horse grooming salon game! Here you will be able to easily choose your own horse and do all the things that need to be done when owning and looking after your horse. Here you can clean out her stall, swat all the annoying flies, as well as wash, dry and brush her to make her look pretty. You can also change her horse shoes and remove any dirt, while also feeding her, watering her, rubbing her down and giving her vaccinations. Once done you can easily accessorize by using a bridle, saddle, and headpiece to prepare her for her day out riding with this fun horse grooming game.

Game Features:

- CHOOSE your very own horse to look after

- CLEAN up all the poo with the broom

- SWAT all the flies before they bite your horse and cause sores

- WASH, rinse, dry and brush your horse ready for her grooming session

- CLEAN her teeth to give her a beautiful smile.

- CHANGE her horse shoes so she can ride without pain or discomfort

- CLIP her hair to make it look nice and straight for her big debut

- VACCINATE your horse so she can be around other horses

- FEED and water your horse so she is ready for riding

- RUB all her good spots to show her you love her

- ACCESSORIZE with a saddle, head piece and bridle

** version 3.0.0 LATEST UPDATE

- play levels you want with our contextual level menu, button is located on the top right corner

- earn coins to unlock new horses

- added new horses

- faster game play
summary: Owning your own horse doesn't have to be a dream, choose yours today.
title: Horse Grooming Salon

description: SubZone - KamchatkaHere is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D. Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates. Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.~ Cyclops GamesIn this new version:* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.* 6 modern submarines you can command* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vesselsPlease rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better ~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea SkirmishNOTES:  BETA VERSION:====================We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic* updates will be frequent while we get everything working* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems MULTIPLAYER:===================* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped  back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
descriptionHTML:
SubZone - Kamchatka

Here is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!

Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D.

Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates.

Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.
~ Cyclops Games


In this new version:

* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.

* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.

* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.

* 6 modern submarines you can command

* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink

* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars

* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vessels

Please rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better

~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea Skirmish

NOTES: BETA VERSION:
====================
We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic
* updates will be frequent while we get everything working
* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems

MULTIPLAYER:
===================
* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.
* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground
* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host
* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
summary: Battle your friends in the ultimate underwater show down.  Download now.
title: Submarine Sim MMO

description: Quiz Fruit is a very good game to test your fruit knowledge, answer the fruit in the picture, get more levels and hints.In the game are simple fruits like orange, kiwi or banana and also difficult as longan, rambutan.Children can also play with this game, they will learn the correct spelling of fruit and memorize fruit.The game is translated into many languages (including English) eg French, German, Polish, Spanish, Russian, Czech, Japanese, Swedish, Norwegian, Dutch, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Danish.YOU MUST PLAY :-)
descriptionHTML:
Quiz Fruit is a very good game to test your fruit knowledge, answer the fruit in the picture, get more levels and hints.

In the game are simple fruits like orange, kiwi or banana and also difficult as longan, rambutan.

Children can also play with this game, they will learn the correct spelling of fruit and memorize fruit.

The game is translated into many languages (including English) eg French, German, Polish, Spanish, Russian, Czech, Japanese, Swedish, Norwegian, Dutch, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Danish.

YOU MUST PLAY :-)

description: The world of Freecraft is waiting for you in the new game FreeCraft My Buildings. Now this world is even more diverse. Behind every corner of this cubic world a new story awaits you. You can watch the wildlife in Creativity mode or participate in her life in Survival mode. But do not think that it's so easy to survive in the world of Freecraft, because it's only in the daytime that ordinary predators can attack you, from which you can hide in a tree or in a hastily built hovel. And at night absolutely other monsters who are hungry to taste your flesh awake!Do not forget about Multiplayer, in which you can survive with your friends, they will always support you in a difficult situation! Build a house, grow vegetables or arrange a PvP battle!Features:- New graphics in pixel style- New unique mobs- Several additional biomes that you can find in Freecraft spaces- 3 modes: Survival, Creative and Survival in Multiplayer- Crafting system, both on a computer- Multiplayer and a huge number of servers- Beautiful Texture Pack- Unique gameplayDownload Free Craft My Buildings for free, create a world in which you want to live!This FreeCraft Open Source Project is an open source software distributed under the LGPLv3 license. You can find the license and the source code on the website. Before using any part of the FreeCraft project, you must fully familiarize yourself with the license (attached to the source code).--- --- ---Official site https://github.com/MyCraftGame/FreeCraft

But do not think that it's so easy to survive in the world of Freecraft, because it's only in the daytime that ordinary predators can attack you, from which you can hide in a tree or in a hastily built hovel. descriptionHTML:
You don’t remember how you got to this island, but now you’re stranded in the wild. Surviving here will be no simple task. First you’ll need to find food, craft some primitive tools, and build a shelter. Think you have what it takes? Your survival adventure is about to begin…

Game features:
*Explore the wilderness!
*Build your house from the ground up!
*Utilize an extensive crafting system with tons of recipes!
*Meet the island fauna!
*Island survival sandbox simulator.

Survivalist tips:
★Begin with chopping wood in the forest. Wood is used for craft.
★Craft armor and weapons for fighting wild animals.
★Don’t starve, survivor: collect all available resources to keep yourself fed.
★Craft everything you might need.
★Keep track of your health, or you won’t survive…

If you like other survival games, play Survival Island: Evolve – it’ll be just what you’re looking for. Begin your survival adventure now!

description: Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft! Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper! Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design  items to make the most unique interior design ever!Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant! Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala! Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a  french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!Craft & BuildSimply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!Play MinigamesPlay minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you! Meet the peopleUse internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend! Explore the infinite worldYou can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it’s your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!Become an interior and exterior designerUse one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design! Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!

description: Have you ever wanted to be a Winx fairy and race through beautiful 3D underwater? Now you can! Winx Sirenix Power lets you swimming through Infinite Ocean, taken straight from the 5th Season of Winx Club! Swim through Pillar of Control as your favorite fairy, and gather as many hearts as you can before the time runs out! Race against Tritannus through the reefs and caves, and avoid spells cast by the Trix! Once you complete your training, you’ll be ready to take on Tritannus with super-powerful spells! Save the Selkies today before Tritannus captures them, and stop him from polluting the Infinite Ocean! description: The Decorate Your Walk In Closet game is a great room decoration game which is capable of releasing your inner interior designer. This game is great fun for everyone to enjoy and allows you to make up your own closet just the way you want it to be.You can decorate this decoration game with wall paper, lighting, ceiling color, flooring, lounge suites, rug, wall decorations, handbag shelving, floor decorations, clothes shelving, jewellery shelving and shoe shelving. This game works by simply clicking on each separate icon multiple times to change the decoration or color of each section the icons represent. You will see each item magically appear and change in front of your eyes. If you want to go back to the basics and restart over all you have to do is press the “reset” button at the bottom left hand side of the screen and your room will go back to the way it was when you first started. This shoes closet decoration game is great fun and can give you plenty of ideas for your own closet design in your own home. With so many decoration games fun you can have, you really can’t go wrong with the inspiring and great Decorate Your Walk In Closet game today!

comments: Cute, fun, challenging and easy to play. BUT, it said "Don't cheat" every four times I click and get wrong, You have to Find the cat, and not all of them are one click and u found it, PLEASE GET RID OF THAT!!!!!! that way I will rate FIVE stars (and say I wish I could rate a bazillion stars)

Meh. The app is okay. The only problem is that there is no hint button. I was stuck on 247 and there was nothing. Didn't  even say on trusty ol' Google! Also, the picture quality is awful. I reckon I could make an app with better quality than this (no offence!) At the end, it literally says 'The End' I have to admit, it would be nice for it to say 'Well done! Thank you for playing! Find The Cat 2 is now available in the app store!' Just to show that is playing this game is appreciated. Overall, okay app, just a few things to make it a bit better.  Btw, the cats are so cute!! (When you can find them!)  Hints: 244 is in the black grid of the red car, to the right. 247 the cat is one of the logs in the house.

244 is really hard but it's a great time killer! But I do think that there should be a hint button and if there is one I missed it. It can be hard with some photos but most of them are really easy! So I think you should definitely get this app! Hope I helped!
Worst game ever U dont do anything u just tap a cat. And they are soo easy to find. Plus there are so many adds its hard to actually get on with the game

I did find it though i just can't press on it so I have no idea what to do.😦 but still, a great game! I recomened this game for cat lovers! ☺😊😀

comments: Pre-registered for this game and it didn't disappoint. Graphics are smooth, characters are great with fluid combat system. My only bad point with it is that after a few days of playing I went to open up the game and it won't load, I get as far as the n way screen then black screen?? Please fix Devs, anxious to delve back into it.

OMG ITS FINALLY OUT! I've been waiting for this to come out for like literally 4 years! Anyway so far I honestly liked the equipment system in the original version better than this one.. I don't like the whole idea of unlocking equipment you got, that just doesn't even make a lot of sense.. Plus there is an equipment list that kinda shows you what everything looks like right now so thats a bit of a spoiler for me for obtaining new gear.. Other than that, the gameplay is great! You get all 4 characters much more immediately and I do like that. 4 stars at this point but I can see myself coming back and bumping it up to 5!

So far so good.. pretty smooth but i guess the graphic got downgraded because i remember this game had better graphic quaLity before.. maybe add graphic quaLity option? aLso the targeting system is a bit too hard.. maybe add an option to assist targeting because it's hard to aim i kept getting missed hits.. overaLL its decent.. keep it up!

The game runs decent although you do need wifi or a very good connection for arena. Everything is very limited due to the awful energy/stamina system which will obviously be a huge downfall. It gets repetitive fairly quick and is limited on what you can actually do. Looks like it will be heavily P2W with all the store sales and again, running out of energy quickly. It's a good game for an hour here or there but for a game that you need to farm items for equipment the energy limit really ruins it. I'll be looking elsewhere for a similar game without the energy/stamina limitations

Fun game, but it pisses me off that games with this potential are ran by greedy companies. This game is littered with P2W aspects and locked behind energy and time walls. It's like corrupting something awesome and makes me sick, I won't be giving this much attention because of it.

Brother who read my comment I don't care who is who read my comments. I think this game is good but not best. Graphics is very good. Addictive every thing is fine but energy which need to start adventurous stages is too costly and take lots of time to recover, this too wrong.also one thing try to increase chacters as possible. Is you are normal reder like my comment and is you are from nway so comenet on my comment and try to improve game.

comments: It's a great game... When I get to play it. But there are so many stupid ads that it completely ruins the game. I totally get that I have to watch ads to not have to pay for it. But having to watch an ad between every level and then another one if I have to restart the level is ridiculous. I spent majority of my time just waiting for the ads to go away. Uninstalling

This is wasting time i downloaded it.  You have to buy candies for play. If you lose a game or if you want to play a game twice your candy will decrease . So your candy will decrease slowly slowly. And at once you will have no candy. So dont download it. It is waste of time. Thanks for seeing my review.

I am sad to write that this game is trying to grab money. The fact that have to pay $15 in order to get unlimited candies makes me mad. I had this game when it first came out a few years ago. I just recently wanted remenisce this game and it turns to be a money grabber. I am also sad to write until change happens, i will never download another app made by zeptolab

It's amazing how bad this app has become, with this humongous amount of imposed, unskippable ads! The game is excellent; I used to love it years ago, but now this app is just a money grabber. I'm very disappointed, and sadly uninstalling it in this very moment.

The game is fun and sometimes challenging but for every 5 seconds of playing the game I have to watch a 30 second commercial.  I know the commercials make it free, but it is beyond ridiculous when i spend 6x more time watching the commercials than playing the game.  I might as well just turn on the TV.

It used to be like the regular Cut the Rope ... until now I have to spend candies on replay & level advances. It used to be relaxing yet challenging but now I have to think of the candies. Why wreck an already okay system??? What a party pooper.

descriptionHTML:
Experiment to feed Om Nom candy! Cut the rope like never before. Everything you love and new gameplay! 200 levels and more to come!

Eager to learn more about Om Nom's adventures? Watch "Om Nom Stories" cartoons and other amazing videos on our YouTube channel!
www.zep.tl/youtube

The little green monster Om Nom is back and hungrier than ever! Team up with the Professor, a mad (but not bad!) scientist determined to study Om Nom’s candy-loving behavior through a series of experiments. Use suction cups and other funny devices to collect shiny gold stars, uncover hidden prizes and unlock new levels!

Key features:

- 8 level packs with 200 levels
- Innovative physics gameplay
- Adorable character
- Outstanding graphics
- Om Nom animation shorts
- Superpowers
- Constant free updates with new levels and animations

About the game:

“Cut the Rope: Experiments from ZeptoLab follows the exact same formula as its predecessor, which means it's awesome.” - IGN

“If Cut the Rope: Experiments uncovers one scientific truth, it’s this: ZeptoLab knows how to put together a charming puzzle game.” - Tapscape

“Cut the Rope: Experiments takes the original's addictive formula and adds a splash of deviousness, thanks to the addition of some cunning new items.” - Pocket Gamer

---------
Now you can earn free superpowers by trying new apps from Getjar. All these permissions allows us to give you Superpowers and Star Key for free.

"Get Tasks" permission. This allows us to give you free Superpowers. If you install an app for a free Superpower, this permission tells us when you have opened it. No other data is captured or stored.
"Get Accounts" permission. This creates a user account for you so you can restore upgrades and purchases.
"Access Network State" permission. This allows us to determine if WiFi is available and use that instead of the Carrier Network.
"Internet" permission. This allows us to communicate on the internet.
"Read Phone State" permission. This is required by some advertisers. No private data is captured or stored.

Help us improve our games. We love your feedback. Contact us at support@zeptolab.com.

Zeptolab UK
Suite/ Office/ Flat 161
2 Old Brompton Road
SW7 3DQ London

summary: Cut the ropes, deliver candy to Om Nom, collect stars, and unlock new levels.
title: Cut the Rope: Experiments FREE

So if you could please reply to this, I'll be so happy. Please and thank you.

description: Sackboy, the knitted hero from the multi-award winning LittleBigPlanet™ series on PlayStation® lands into the palm of your hand in this brand new endless platformer! RUN as fast as you can through an ever-changing handcrafted world DASH to ESCAPE the GOO and the clutches of the grumpy Negativitron! *Iconic worlds and characters from the LittleBigPlanet™ games *Exclusive costumes to customise your Sackboy *Collect Stickers to unlock Prizes! *Power Ups and Upgrades including the all-new Glider! *Challenge and compete with your friendsRun SackBoy! Run! is free to download and can be played without making In App Purchases, however some in-game items such as Save Me Hearts can be acquired through in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases on your device.Bubbles can be purchased or can be collected in game at no extra cost. They can also be used to buy special costumes that increase your multiplier, upgrades to power ups, Save Me Hearts or Lucky Chests.Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and uses push notifications, this feature can be turned off by disabling it on your device.A third party Analytics provider (Google Analytics) may collect data about how you use this app. This can be disabled within the settings menu within Run Sackboy! Run!.A valid Facebook account is required to activate Leaderboards.A third party solution (Ad Colony) is used within the game for promotional purposes.
descriptionHTML:
Sackboy, the knitted hero from the multi-award winning LittleBigPlanet™ series on PlayStation® lands into the palm of your hand in this brand new endless platformer!

RUN as fast as you can through an ever-changing handcrafted world
DASH to ESCAPE the GOO and the clutches of the grumpy Negativitron!

*Iconic worlds and characters from the LittleBigPlanet™ games
*Exclusive costumes to customise your Sackboy
*Collect Stickers to unlock Prizes!
*Power Ups and Upgrades including the all-new Glider!
*Challenge and compete with your friends

Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and can be played without making In App Purchases, however some in-game items such as Save Me Hearts can be acquired through in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases on your device.

Bubbles can be purchased or can be collected in game at no extra cost. They can also be used to buy special costumes that increase your multiplier, upgrades to power ups, Save Me Hearts or Lucky Chests.

Run SackBoy! Run! is free to download and uses push notifications, this feature can be turned off by disabling it on your device.

A third party Analytics provider (Google Analytics) may collect data about how you use this app. This can be disabled within the settings menu within Run Sackboy! Run!.

A valid Facebook account is required to activate Leaderboards.

A third party solution (Ad Colony) is used within the game for promotional purposes.
developerAddress:
PlayStation Mobile Inc.
2207 Bridgepointe Parkway
San Mateo, CA 94404
United States

summary: Help Sackboy escape the Negativitron in this new adventure from LittleBigPlanet™
title: Run Sackboy! Run!

comments: This game is by far one of the BEST games I've ever downloaded. There are so many different games within and the story line so far is awesome. I love how interactive it is and the fact that you have so much to work up towards! Yes the ads may suck but it's free so I can't complain. Absolute A+ for whomever created this, highly recommend and I hope there will be more games like this!

Nice looking game, from what I can tell after 3 levels. Do I want to pay $15 to play more? I dont think it is that good. I do like the interactive intro/start up, and the game runs smooth. Graphics look nice. But still is it worth $15?  Dont think so, sorry guys. But I am sure other people might get enjoyment from this game so much they will pay to play. Good luck with it guys.

This is one of the BEST time management games I've ever played; I've never come across a time management game with such a beautiful story line. You will not regret playing this. Plus, this game doesn't force you to buy it; just sit through some ads. It's completely worth it. I can't stop raving about this game to my friends. Had me in tears a few levels into the story.

Wow... just by reading the comments other people write impressed me. I love games with acual storylines... I thing all games should have a storyline now. (And yeah, I do love the game, I just hadn't finished it when I commented so I gave it a three for then.)

I loved it! So rare to find genuinely good mobile games but this was great! I didn't play the previous game (or games) but this one was amazing with the story, so well crafted. The gameplay was repetitive, but not boring. What happened to Victor!?!

The game is great, but I paid $12 for the full version why am I seeing ads now? I never seen them before, so now your forcing ads after each level. Getting paid twice one from us the customers & many of times from the companies ads your running. I'm requesting a refund even though I love the game itself. Just shouldn't  be force to back out of an ad after each level so I can continue playing after I've paid for the EXPENSIVE full version. You should be ashamed. GREED that's all you guys are about.
description: Your favorite doctor Allison is back in a gripping hospital time management game that you'll never forget! And neither will she... 🏥 🚑 🔥❤️ PLAY THE EAGERLY AWAITED SEQUEL to Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal and join your favorite doctor on a breathtaking new adventure❤️ BECOME A DOCTOR in 60 captivating time management levels and 30 extra challenge stages❤️ DISCOVER 23 MINI-GAMES and perform special treatments, like filling lungs with oxygen, focusing readouts and removing negative emotions❤️ WITNESS A MEDICAL DRAMA filled with romance, friendship, drama, and life-changing decisions❤️ UPGRADE THE HOSPITAL by completing levels and earning new equipment across 6 heated chapters❤️ CATCH UP WITH THE CAST and find out what's been going down with all your favorite characters from Little Creek Hospital❤️ COMPLETE SPECIAL CHALLENGES and collect diamonds to decorate Allison's apartment❤️ ENJOY MANY EXTRAS like competing against your friends in an endless levelReady to find out what drama Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat will bring our beloved doctor? 👩‍⚕️This season picks up right after the previous compelling adventure. Things finally seem to have calmed down at Little Creek Hospital... 🏥But not for long! When Allison receives a phone call from her mother, she doesn't know what to think. She hasn't seen her mom in over 20 years! Why would she contact Allison after all this time? And what could she want? Allison is left with no choice other than to face her past, in order to discover her future... Will she have the strength to cope with everything that has happened and all that is yet to come? There's only one way to find out... Help Allison face her tragic past in this fiery hospital time management game! 💉 🚑 🔥Try the first few levels for free! descriptionHTML:
Your favorite doctor Allison is back in a gripping hospital time management game that you'll never forget! And neither will she... 🏥 🚑 🔥

❤️ PLAY THE EAGERLY AWAITED SEQUEL to Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal and join your favorite doctor on a breathtaking new adventure
❤️ BECOME A DOCTOR in 60 captivating time management levels and 30 extra challenge stages
❤️ DISCOVER 23 MINI-GAMES and perform special treatments, like filling lungs with oxygen, focusing readouts and removing negative emotions
❤️ WITNESS A MEDICAL DRAMA filled with romance, friendship, drama, and life-changing decisions
❤️ UPGRADE THE HOSPITAL by completing levels and earning new equipment across 6 heated chapters
❤️ CATCH UP WITH THE CAST and find out what's been going down with all your favorite characters from Little Creek Hospital
❤️ COMPLETE SPECIAL CHALLENGES and collect diamonds to decorate Allison's apartment
❤️ ENJOY MANY EXTRAS like competing against your friends in an endless level

Ready to find out what drama Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat will bring our beloved doctor? 👩‍⚕️

This season picks up right after the previous compelling adventure. Things finally seem to have calmed down at Little Creek Hospital... 🏥

But not for long! When Allison receives a phone call from her mother, she doesn't know what to think. She hasn't seen her mom in over 20 years! Why would she contact Allison after all this time? And what could she want? Allison is left with no choice other than to face her past, in order to discover her future...
Will she have the strength to cope with everything that has happened and all that is yet to come? There's only one way to find out...

Help Allison face her tragic past in this fiery hospital time management game! 💉 🚑 🔥

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

Follow Allison on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/heartsmedicinegame/

Enjoy more GameHouse Original Stories, and try our other games:

description: Surgeon! It’s a call from ER emergency room, patients suffering from various injury are waiting in emergency hospital. Let’s operate them and be a life saver in this brand new hospital games. Kids Hospital Emergency Rescue - Doctor Games provides you the life saving opportunity by doing some complex surgery inside hospital emergency room where you can apply some crazy medical procedures on hospital patient. So crazy doctor surgeon are you ready to use life saving tools, techniques and injection to become the life saver crazy surgeon in Kids Hospital Emergency Rescue - Doctor Games. This kids doctor games is the best educational app for kids where they learn how to be the life saver of patients when kids are on hospital duty. Hospital Emergency Rescue - Doctor Game provides lifeline to patient that are brought to hospital emergency room on ambulance. You can also take blood tests and give injections to patients.Treating patients with kindness using best time management skills that will make little kids expert hospital emergency doctor. ER Surgeon lets start with basic health checkup, monitor blood pressure, respiratory system, health and fitness in hospital kids doctor games. Hospital emergency is full of crucial patients suffering from different injuries, heart diseases that require crazy surgeon to be available. Check the availability of doctor surgeon in ER emergency room, kidney doctor, eye surgery doctor, lungs doctor, eye surgery doctor and treat the patient of knee surgery and foot sole injury well. Its going to be a tough kids hospital duty but little kids need to learn how it feels to be a crazy surgeon doctor in kids hospital life saving mission. You are the life line in emergency hospital and life saving is your ultimate goal. For doing your hospital duty well you need to perform various surgery with life saving tools and injection. Call the ER hospital emergency doctor and anesthetist timely so the surgery do not get delayed. Keep checking patients heart, brain, lungs, kidney, eye, ear, nose liver, tongue, stomach and other body part to prevent them getting into frozen state. Like a real surgeon doctor give proper attention and treatment to patients in Kids Hospital Emergency Rescue - Doctor Games. Be professional hospital duty doctor whether you need to be an ER emergency doctor, anesthetist, brain surgeon in  kids hospital games. Use tweezers to pluck thorns and disinfect the wounds with best medical care. Discharge your patients when done with your hospital duty and make them happy. Features:•	Fun surgeries, operations and treatments!•	Become a professional surgeon in kids hospital games!•	Treat your patients well when you are on hospital duty!•	Complete challenging life saving missions in crazy surgery simulator!•	Use medical tools and techniques in this amazing doctor games!

description: A lot of parents worry because their children don’t want to use the toilet or don’t use it properly. The "Toilet Training" app teaches potty training in a clear and fun way. It is designed for children aged under 3 and shows real life situations through cute graphics and sounds. It will guide your children towards developing a habit of properly going to the toilet.Fun features:- Audio instructions: friendly and to-the-point instructions facilitate learning and make the process more fun. - Interactive design: aimed at satisfying kids’curiosity.- Simple and child-friendly gameplay. - Didactic game concept: It instils positive habits and teaches correct behavior so parents don’t have to worry about the little ones not using the toilet properly.- -- --  Design concepts:We focus on inspirational learningWe focus on skill-buildingWe focus on bringing fun contents to our young audienceTake the baby bus for an unique learning experience!The series introduction:Baby Bus is the first trusted brand in early childhood educational software. The mobile applications are designed and developed specifically for preschoolers, and they are divided into two groups by age, the Starter Group for toddlers between the ages of 1 and 3 and the Prodigy Group for children between the ages of 3 and 6. The educational series in the Prodigy Group combines the main concepts of early childhood education to meet the needs of mastering different learning categories. The applications are aimed at the comprehensive and the analytic development in preschoolers.Tips: In the search bar, enter "BabyBus" to find all of our products.Feel free to tell us your thoughts on our games and services using the contact methods listed below:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BabyBusENGLISHE-mail: en@babybus.comWebsite: http://www.babybus.com
